If left blank, it will default to the primary billing address of the customer.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't enter a Bill-To Address unless the billable entity is a customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a valid Bill-To Address for this customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Bill_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Bill-To_Address_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Address Information Data for the Bill-To Address</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Customer_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>reference id for ship-to customer</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer that is part of the Customer's Connection Map.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>reference id for ship-to address</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer first before entering a Ship-To Address Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Ship-To Address you entered is not valid for this Ship-To Customer. If you did not enter a Ship-To Customer, Workday chose the default for this Sold-To Customer for you, and this Ship-To Address is not valid for that customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Address_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Billable_Project_Reference" type="wd:ProjectObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billable Project for Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Adjustment_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Invoice_Adjustment_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Adjustment Reason.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Increase_Amount_Due" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean flag for Increase Amount Due. In most cases, adjustments are used to decrease the amount due to the customer, in which case they are called credit memos. However, there are some circumstances where an adjustment is needed to increase the amount due. In this case, set this value.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Original_Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_InvoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Invoice that the Adjustment is for.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Original Invoice Customer must match the Customer on the Adjustment Invoice.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Original Invoice Customer must match the Customer on the Adjustment Invoice.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Auto-Apply_Adjustment_to_Invoice" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean flag to indicate that the Customer Invoice Adjustment should automatically be applied to the Customer Invoice once the Adjustment is approved. Only applies if "Increase Liability" is false, and a Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot have a "Reference Invoice" specified and "Auto-Apply" set to true if the Reference Invoice already has one of the following in progress: Customer Payment Application, Customer Invoice Maintenance, Bad Debt Writeoff, or a different Customer Invoice Adjustment referencing the same invoice and set to Auto-Apply.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Clear the Auto-Apply Adjustment option because the reference invoice has the activity [activity] in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency entered is not listed as an Accepted Currency by Customer.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency entered is not listed as an Accepted Currency by Customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency must be specified or Company must have a default Currency</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency must be specified or Company must have a default Currency</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Adjustment_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Invoice Adjustment Date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Accounting_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override date for Accounting.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a date in an open period.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>'Allow Accounting in Arrears' is not permitted for this company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Date is required for this Company. Enter an Accounting Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Date not allowed for direct intercompany customer invoices.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'From Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not greater than 'To Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'To Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not less than 'From Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Due_Date_Override" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY.
If a date is provided, it will override the due date that Workday automatically determines based on the invoice date and payment terms.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Due Date must not be earlier than Invoice Date</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Due Date must not be earlier than Invoice Date</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Collection_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into collection. If this field is populated when updating an existing invoice, the invoice adjustment will be put into collection.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot be put into collection if it decreases liability.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Amount_Promised"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The amount the customer promises to pay when the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into collection.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Promise to pay amount can only be entered if there is a collection date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment amount promised cannot be greater than the amount due.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Collection_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Collection_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reason the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into collection. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Collection Code can only be entered if there is a collection date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Followup_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice Adjustment should be followed up. This field is optional and populated by the user when being put into collection, dispute or on hold.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The invoice must either be in collection, dispute, or on hold to enter a followup date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Followup date cannot be in the past.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into dispute. If this field is populated when updating an existing invoice, the invoice adjustment will be put into dispute.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot be put into dispute if it decreases liability.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The amount the Customer Invoice Adjustment dispute is over. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A dispute amount can only be entered if there is a dispute date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Dispute amount cannot be greater than the amount due.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Dispute_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reason the Customer Invoice Adjustment was put into dispute. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A dispute reason can only be entered if there is a dispute date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Control_Amount_Total"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the expected invoice total including tax. It is optional. An invoice cannot be submittted for approval if it has a non-zero control total that does not equal the sum of the extended amount for all invoice lines plus tax.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Terms_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TermsObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of the payment terms for the invoice. Payment Terms are the rules for establishing when a invoice payment is due and whether discounts are eligible to be taken or given for early payment. This is a required field, but if no payment terms are specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment terms if one is defined. Workday will automatically determine the due date and discount date based on the invoice date and payment terms.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A payment term with a discount is not allowed when the VAT on Payment option is turned on for the Company</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Terms is Required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Document Payment Status for Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Document_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Document Status for Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the payment type for the transaction and needs to be the reference id value of the payment type. Payment Type establishes methods of making payments, such as cash, check, or electronic transfer. Workday supplies the payment methods. Usually there is a one-to-one relationship between payment type (which you define) and Workday's provided payment methods. If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined. Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection would be initiated by Workday.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Type_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Reference ID of Customer Invoice Type which is used to help categorize invoices as well as determine the invoice layout that is used for the printed invoice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If not submitted, Workday will use the payee default the tax code.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tax Code can't be set if you enabled Third Party Tax Service for this company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_PO_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This PO number will print on the delivered customer invoice. It is optional freeform text. This is not a Workday Purchase Order Reference ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="On_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>TRUE or FALSE If this is set to 'TRUE' the invoice will be put on hold.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Customer_Worktags" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Include Default Customer Worktags if this flag is TRUE</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Worktags_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize. Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>[list of worktag types] not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction header memo will print on the delivered transaction. It is optional freeform text</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Type_Override_Reference" type="wd:Currency_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice adjustment, this allows you to override the default Rate Type used to look up the currency conversion rate.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Date_Override" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice adjustment, this allows you to override the date used to look up the currency conversion rate. The default date is normally the same as the invoice date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Manual_Override_Reference"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice adjustment, this allows you to directly override the currency conversion rate that will be used.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Calculation_Details" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text field to summarize Tax Calculation Details.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Enable the Use Third Party Tax Service setting for the Company first to set the Tax Calculation Details.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Use Third Party Tax Service is not enabled for: [company].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Line_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Line_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice Line Data. A Customer Invoice may have multiple lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Data" type="wd:Taxable_Code_Application_NO_INPUT_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Tax Data by Tax Authority and Tax Code. For Customer Invoice Documents and Cash Sales tax data will always be calculated from the line data regardless of what is populated in Tax Rate Application Data. For Purchase Orders, Supplier Invoice Documents and Ad hoc Payments, if data is in Tax Rate Application Data, then that will be the tax information that is saved. Otherwise, the tax will be calculated from the lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Attachment_Data" type="wd:Financials_Attachment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Attachment Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Note_Data" type="wd:Note_WWS_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Intercompany_Sub_Process" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Intercompany_Sub_ProcessType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Customer Invoice Adjustment reference for update and all Customer Invoice Adjustment data items</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Customer Invoice is canceled and cannot be resubmitted.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Customer Invoice is canceled and cannot be resubmitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Web Service is set to Add Only; documents cannot be resubmitted.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Web Service is set to Add Only; documents cannot be resubmitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Can only modify Customer Invoice Adjustments that have come from a Web Service or have been Manually Entered</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Can only modify Customer Invoice Adjustments that have come from a Web Service or have been Manually Entered</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Customer Invoice Adjustment is attached to a Supplier Invoice Adjustment and cannot be modified.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Customer Invoice Adjustment is attached to a Supplier Invoice Adjustment and cannot be modified.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't use web services to change documents with fields and line amounts reported in 1 or more tax declarations. Create an invoice adjustment if you want to add or change values reported in these tax declarations: [taxDeclaration].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment for update only purposes</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Business_Process_Parameters" type="wd:Financials_Business_Process_ParametersType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Business Process Parameters provide the ability to auto-submit to the business process.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice Adjustment Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Submit Customer Invoice Adjustment Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Exceptions_Response_Data" type="wd:Application_Instance_Related_Exceptions_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exceptions Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Request</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice can't be canceled when one of its lines are tied to a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A Customer Invoice cannot be cancelled when it is linked to a Supplier Invoice that is not cancelled or denied.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice cannot be cancelled when it is linked to a Supplier Invoice that is not cancelled or denied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't use web services to change documents with fields and line amounts reported in 1 or more tax declarations. Create an invoice adjustment if you want to add or change values reported in these tax declarations: [taxDeclaration].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_InvoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>This Invoice is not Cancelable.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_InvoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Adjustment Request</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice Adjustment can't be canceled when one of its lines are tied to a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot be cancelled when it has Supplier Invoice Adjustment that is not cancelled.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't use web services to change documents with fields and line amounts reported in 1 or more tax declarations. Create an invoice adjustment if you want to add or change values reported in these tax declarations: [taxDeclaration].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>This Invoice is not Cancelable.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Adjustment Response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Exception_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exception (Errors and Warning) associated with the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Classification" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exception Classification (Error or Warning)</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Message" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exception Detail</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Category_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing reference instances for a Customer Category</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Customer_Category_Reference" type="wd:Customer_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer name="Cash_Sale_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing all Cash Sale data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The total extended amount of all zero.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Please enter at least one invoice line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please enter at least one invoice line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Financial Account not valid for entry if not recording a deposit.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Financial Account not valid for entry if not recording a deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency is required if the Company specified does not have a default currency.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency is required, because the Company Reference: [company] does not have a default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Direct Debit and Credit Card are not valid payment types for a Cash Sale.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Direct Debit and Credit Card are not valid payment types for a Cash Sale.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer Reference is for a Customer, not for a Sponsor.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer Reference is for a Customer, not for a Sponsor.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Cash_Sale_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cash Sale ID. This is the Cash Sale unique identifier</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Cash Sale inside the Workday application. Cash Sale can only be updated from the web service</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Company which holds the asset</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the customer that the invoice is for. This is the reference id value of the customer</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If not submitted, Workday will use the payee default the tax code.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Cash_Sale_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cash Sale Date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Type_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Reference ID of Customer Invoice Type which is used to help categorize invoices as well as determine the invoice layout that is used for the printed invoice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'From Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not greater than 'To Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'To Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not less than 'From Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the payment type for the transaction and needs to be the reference id value of the payment type. Payment Type establishes methods of making payments, such as cash, check, or electronic transfer. Workday supplies the payment methods. Usually there is a one-to-one relationship between payment type (which you define) and Workday's provided payment methods. If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined. Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection would be initiated by Workday.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Check_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Check Number</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Record_Deposit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean flag for Record Deposit</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Bank_Account_Reference" type="wd:Financial_AccountObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Bank Account</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Bank_Account_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Bank Account is not valid for Company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Bank Account is not valid for Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Bank Account Reference is required if Record Deposit is true.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Bank Account Reference is required if Record Deposit is true.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deposit_Reference_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Free form text field for a Cash Sale Reference Number.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Type_Reference" type="wd:Currency_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Currency Rate Type</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Rate Type cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Rate Type cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rate Data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Rate cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Rate cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction header memo will print on the delivered transaction. It is optional freeform text</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Control_Total_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the expected invoice total including tax. It is optional. An invoice cannot be submittted for approval if it has a non-zero control total that does not equal the sum of the extended amount for all invoice lines plus tax.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Cash_Sale_Line_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Line_WWS_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Attachment_Data" type="wd:Financials_Attachment_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Data" type="wd:Taxable_Code_Application_NO_INPUT_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Tax Data by Tax Authority and Tax Code. For Customer Invoice Documents and Cash Sales tax data will always be calculated from the line data regardless of what is populated in Tax Rate Application Data. For Purchase Orders, Supplier Invoice Documents and Ad hoc Payments, if data is in Tax Rate Application Data, then that will be the tax information that is saved. Otherwise, the tax will be calculated from the lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Cash_Sale_Intercompany_Sub_Process" type="wd:Cash_Sale_Intercompany_Sub_ProcessType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Cash_Sale_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Cash Sale If field is left blank, it will default to the same company as the contract header.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Set up an intercompany relationship between [hdr company] and [line company] using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and the line company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Company cannot be modified on this Contract line</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Company cannot be modified on this Contract line</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Company on the line must be the same as Company on the document for intercompany customers.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item_Reference" type="wd:Item_DescriptorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the sales item. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Sales_Item_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Sales Item is not enterable for this Customer Contract Amendment</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Sales Item is not enterable for this Customer Contract Amendment</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The sales item is not mapped to a purchase item.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The sales item is not mapped to a purchase item.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Category_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the spend category. A spend category is a classification of items and services that drive the accounting. All expense items are associated with a Spend Category and sales items are associated with a Revenue Category. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both. It is required if sales item is blank.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Revenue_Category_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Revenue Category is not enterable for Customer Contract Amendment</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category is not enterable for Customer Contract Amendment</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The revenue category is not mapped to a spend category.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The revenue category is not mapped to a spend category.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Contract_Line_Type_Reference" type="wd:Contract_Line_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line Type for Customer Contract Line.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Line Type must be Fixed Amount - Revenue Only if the Contract Type is designated as a linked contract on the Maintain Customer Contract Types task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Billable_Project_Reference" type="wd:Project_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billable Project Reference for Contract Line. Billable Project is required for project contract line types.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Project_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Invoices before you amend the Billable Project on Contract Line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cancel Invoices before you amend the Billable Project on Contract Line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Schedules on the contract line before you amend the Billable Project.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cancel Schedules on the contract line before you amend the Billable Project.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Project_Transaction_Source_Reference" type="wd:Project_Transaction_SourceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Project Transaction Source Reference. before you amend the Project Transaction Source.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cancel Schedules on the contract line before you amend the Project Transaction value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Frequency_Behavior_Reference" value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Exclude_From_Calculation" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This option may be set in order to exclude the contract line from the Revenue allocation calculation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Range_Low"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Range Low is the lower range value calculated for the Revenue Allocation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Range_High"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Range High is the Higher range value calculated for the Revenue Allocation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="MidRange"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Mid Range is the median value calculated for the Revenue Allocation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Relative_Selling_Price_Allocation"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Relative Selling Price Allocation calculated based on Range Low,Range High and Mid Range values</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Renewable" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Renewable</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="New_Business" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line New Business</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Deferred Revenue</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Deferred Revenue Flag is not enterable for this Customer Contract Amendment</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Deferred Revenue Flag is not enterable for this Customer Contract type="wd:Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_TemplateObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to a Revenue Recognition Schedule Template. This allows you to automatically generate Revenue Recognition Installments upon approval of the contract.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule Template can only be selected if Deferred Revenue is selected.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Contract_Line_Revenue_Override_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Entered Revenue value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Default_Worktags_Reference" type="wd:Audited_Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Default Worktags not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category worktag is not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>list of worktag types not valid for this transaction : [types]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category worktag is not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a balancing worktag for Worktags of the following type: [type]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The balancing worktag for the contract line cannot be changed because there are in process or processed billing or processed billing or revenue recognition installments for the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description_Override" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Item Description Override</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Invoice_Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Memo for the Invoice line. This is free form text.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Invoice_Memo_Override" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Invoice Memo Override</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Customer_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The ship to customer for the contract line. This field will default from header if left blank.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The ship to customer must be a part of the Customer's connection map.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer that is part of the Customer's Connection Map.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The ship to address reference for the contract line. If there is a ship to customer on the line and this field is left blank, it will default to the ship to connection's default address.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer first before entering a Ship-To Address Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Ship-To Address you entered is not valid for this Ship-To Customer. If you did not enter a Ship-To Customer, Workday chose the default for this Sold-To Customer for you, and this Ship-To Address is not valid for that customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Address_Information_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The exact address specified in the address reference stored on the contract.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Applicability_Reference" type="wd:Tax_ApplicabilityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax applicability. If this is blank and there invoice line has a sales item, Workday will default tax applicability from the sales item. If the invoice line has a tax code then tax applicability is required.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If this is blank, Workday will default in the default tax code from the invoice header if there is one. If the invoice line has a tax applicability value, Workday will validate that the invoice line also has a tax code.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billing Schedule Template From Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billing Schedule Template To Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Billing_Notes" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Billing Notes</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Recognition_Line_Notes" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Revenue Recognition Line Notes</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Document_Status_Reference" type="wd:Document_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Status Override</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't cancel the Contract Line until invoices or revenue recognition finishes processing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't cancel the line because this customer contract has recognized deferred revenue.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Billed To Date Amount of zero to cancel the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter an Amendment Date that is on or after the To Date of the award line to set the line status to complete.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Contract Line Amount of zero to cancel the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Line Override Status is not enterable for Customer Contract.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't complete this contract line because the contract line amount is not equal to the billed to date amount</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't terminate this contract line because it has a deferred revenue balance without a revenue override amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't terminate this contract line because the contract line amount is not equal to the billed to date amount</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't complete this contract line because it has a deferred revenue balance without a revenue override amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Verify that you want to terminate or complete deferred revenue balances on 1 or more contract lines with a revenue override amount because your deferred revenue could become out of balance.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Local_Person_Name_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the components of a name in local script, such as the First Name and Last Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains first name in local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Middle_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains middle name in local script for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains last name in local script, which is generally configured to as Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Secondary_Last_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains secondary last name in local script, which is generally configured to as Maternal Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains first name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Middle_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains middle name in second local script for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains last name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Secondary_Last_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains secondary last name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Maternal Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Local_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the formatted local name in local script as configured for the country.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute name="Local_Script" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the formatted local script name which contains the ISO code and name.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Customer_Payment_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element for the Put Customer Payment Request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_PaymentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Payment.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Request References element contains the specific instance set that should be returned in the Get operation. Either a Reference ID or the Workday ID (GUID) should be specified for each instance to be returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Customer_Payment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Payment_for_InvoicesObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Request References</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Request Criteria element.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Company_Reference" type="wd:OrganizationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Company which holds the asset</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Remit-from_Customer_Reference" type="wd:PayeeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This it the customer the paymetn is for. name="Payment_Date_On_or_After" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Date on Date or After</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Date_On_or_Before" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Date on Date or Before</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Created_by_Worker_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a Worker who created the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Tranaction_is_Intercompany" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Transaction Is Intercompany</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Response Group allows the request to specify which data attributes should be returned in the Response, such as whether to include reference elements, attachments, etc.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Include Reference</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Customer_Payments_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element for the Get Customer Payments name="Customer_PaymentType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes Customer Payment for Invoices instance and an existing Customer Payment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment" type="wd:Customer_PaymentType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment instance and
