the Response on the Get operation. Contains the instances returned by the Get operation and their accompanying data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Customer Payment Request Reference Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Customer Paynent Request Criteria Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Respones Filter Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Customer Payment Response Group Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Results" type="wd:Response_ResultsType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Customer Payment Response Results element, including total results and paging</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Customer Payment Response Data element.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Remittance Advice is used in Workday's Auto-Application logic to determine which Customer Invoices a Customer Payment should be applied to, and how they should be applied. Included in Remittance Advice can be specific Customer Invoice(s) references, an Amount to Pay, the Bill-to Customer reference, and Customer Payment Remittance Advice Details which include Customer Name, Customer ID, PO Number, Invoice Number and Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_DocumentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a Customer Invoice that should be paid by the Customer Payment this Remittance Advice is for.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Invoice_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Amount_to_Pay"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Suggested amount to pay in this remittance advice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Bill-to_Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Suggested Bill-to Customer to pay, which will help determine which invoice(s) should be paid.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Details_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Details_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice Details are any of the following chosen, along with free-form text for each: Customer Name, Customer ID, PO Number, Invoice Number and Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Details_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice Details are any of the following chosen, along with free-form text for each: Customer Name, Customer ID, PO Number, Invoice Number and Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Remittance_Advice_Type_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice Type Reference is a metadata reference to either: Customer Name, Customer ID, Invoice Number, PO Number or Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Detail_Information" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Remittance Advice Detail Information is free form text that describes the Remittance Advice Type it is paired with.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Data Element for Put and Get Customer Payment for Invoices.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Payment Amount must be greater than 0.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Amount must be greater than 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Ready to Auto-Apply cannot be true unless a Remit-From Customer is provided, and the Payment Type selected is not a Credit Card or Direct Debit type.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Ready to Auto-Apply cannot be true unless a Remit-From Customer is provided, and the Payment Type selected is not a Credit Card or Direct Debit type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The customer selected does not have credit card information setup, selecting a payment type with a payment method of Credit Card where no credit card information is setup will not perform integrations with any payment provider.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The customer selected does not have credit card information setup, selecting a payment type with a payment method of Credit Card where no credit card information is setup will not perform integrations with any payment provider.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Direct Debit can only be utilized if Customer has a Settlement Bank Account configured.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Direct Debit can only be utilized if Customer has a Settlement Bank Account configured.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Payment Type must be valid for Bank Account entered.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Type must be valid for Bank Account entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Payment Date cannot be greater than the Deposit Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Payment Date cannot be greater than the Deposit Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot deposit payment into a Customer Deposit that isn't part of Payment Company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot deposit payment into a Customer Deposit that isn't part of Payment Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Currency is not accepted by Customer Deposit's Financial Account.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer Payment Currency is not accepted by Customer Deposit's Financial Account.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Remit from Customer is required when Locked-in-Workday is enabled.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment for Invoices ID. This is the Customer Payment unique identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Customer Payment inside the Workday Application. Customer Payment can only be updated from the web service is this is set.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Company which holds the asset</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Company for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the payment If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the customer has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for customer then payment will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Currency for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Payment_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Transaction date of the Customer Payment.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Payment Date for this payment because it is already included in a deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the payment type for the transaction and needs to be the reference id value of the payment type. Payment Type establishes methods of making payments, such as cash, check, or electronic transfer. Workday supplies the payment methods. Usually there is a one-to-one relationship between payment type (which you define) and Workday's provided payment methods. If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined. Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection would be initiated by Workday.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Status.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Payment_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Total Payment Amount for the Customer Payment</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Payment Amount for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Payment Amount for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Remit-from_Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Remit-from Customer that is funding this payment .</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Check_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Check Number</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction header memo will print on the delivered transaction. It is optional freeform text</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Ready_to_Auto-Apply" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Ready to Auto-Apply makes this Customer Payment available to the Auto-Application process if it is run prior to this payment being applied manually. Remit-from Customer is required if Ready to Auto-Apply is checked.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Electronic_File_Information" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Electronic File Information is free form text that may be entered to identify the Electronic File that initiated this web service integration.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Deposit_Reference" type="wd:Customer_DepositObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The optional reference identification for an existing Workday Customer Deposit that matches Payment Company and Currency, and is still in draft and able to accept more customer payments.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payments using payment methods of Credit Card, Direct Debit, or Direct Deposit cannot be included in a Customer Deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Customer Deposit for this payment because it is already included in another In Progress or Approved deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If a Customer Deposit is referenced, it must be in Draft Status.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>If a Customer Deposit is referenced, it must be in Draft Status.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Do_Not_Apply_Payment_to_Invoices_on_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If set to True, Do Not Apply Payment to Invoices on Hold indicates whether this payment should be used to apply to Customer Invoices that are On Hold from Payment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Show_Only_Matched_Invoices_when_Applying" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If true, the customer payment will show only customer invoice documents that match the remittance criteria during application of payment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice for this Customer Payment, utilized in Workday's Auto-Application logic in determining which Customer Invoices to apply this payment to.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Deposit_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Request References element contains the specific instance set that should be returned in the Get operation. Either a Reference ID or the Workday ID (GUID) should be specified for each instance to be returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Customer_Deposit_Reference" type="wd:Customer_DepositObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Deposit.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Deposit_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element is the wrapper around a list of elements representing the Customer Request specific criteria needed to search for instances. This is the reference id value of the customer</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Hierarchy_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing customer that has child customers</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Status_Reference" type="wd:Business_Entity_Status_ValueObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing instance of Business type="wd:Financial_AccountObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Bank Account that the Customer Deposit will be name="Payment_Deposit_Date_On_or_Before" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Deposit Date On or After must be earlier than Payment Deposit Date On or Before.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deposit_Reference_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Free form text name="Customer_Deposit_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Customer Deposit reference for update and all Customer Deposit data items.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Payment Deposit Date must be greater than the Payment Date for all Payments Account.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Transaction Currency not accepted by selected Bank Account.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Bank Account is either not valid for Company or Currency, or is not enabled for Customer Payments.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Bank Account is either not valid for Company or Currency, or is not enabled for Customer Payments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Please select at least one payment to deposit.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please select Deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ID" This is the Customer Deposit unique identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Customer Payment inside the Workday Application. This is the reference id value of the company.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Payment_Deposit_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Customer Deposit date. Enter this amount to ensure it matches the sum of the payment amounts deposited.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Type_Reference" type="wd:Currency_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Currency Rate Type</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rate Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="21"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Electronic_File_Information" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Electronic File Information is free form text that may be entered to identify the Electronic File that initiated this web service integration.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference" type="wd:Customer_PaymentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to 1 to many Customer Payments existing in Workday, to include in this deposit.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Credit Card, Direct Debit, and Direct Deposit payments cannot be included when submitting Customer Deposits.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more of the Customer Payments selected to deposit is already canceled. Only non-canceled payments can be deposited.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Company for all Customer Payments specified must match the Company of the Customer Deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more of the Cash Sales selected to deposit is in progress. This value is read-only and will be ignored on the submit web service.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Customer_Deposit_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Customer Deposit reference for update and all Customer Deposit data name="Note_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Includes Notes that have been made for a business object. On a Get operation, all existing Notes will be populated. On a Put or Submit operation, any note information on the request will be added as new notes. Existing notes cannot be updated on a Put or Submit request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Created" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date and time this Note was created. If this element is not included then ALL of the Response Groups are included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Award Reference is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Award_Contract_data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Award Reference data is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Attachment_data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if Award Attachment Data should be included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Awards_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element is the top-level request element for all Award "Get" operations.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Award reference element used to return the Award by unique identifier</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the wrapper element for the list of criteria representing the Award specific criteria needed to search for name="Response_Group" type="wd:Award_Contract_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element content containing Award Response Group element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Award_ContractType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes all data for a single Award Contract.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Reference" type="wd:Award_ContractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a single Award for which data is being returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Data" type="wd:Award_Contract_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Award_Contract_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element containing Award Response Data for requested references or criteria and for requested response group</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Award" type="wd:Award_ContractType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Awards_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Award response elements including echoed request data and request result data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_ReferencesType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_CriteriaType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Award_Contract_Response_GroupType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Results" type="wd:Response_ResultsType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Data" type="wd:Award_Contract_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Award Response Data element.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Award_Contract_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains all of the data to describe an Award Contract in Sponsor.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Authorized Amount must be equal to the sum of the Contract Line Extended Amounts.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Schedule specified is already associated with another Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award required.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Schedule is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Flow Through Sponsor is required if Sub Award is true.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Flow Through Sponsor is required if Sub Award is true.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>At least one and only one award line must be marked as Primary.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>At least one and only one award line must be marked as Primary.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One or more Grants specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Grant can only be defined on active.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Purpose Code must be active.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Purpose Code must be active.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Payment Type associated with the Letter of Credit Reference must match the Payment Type Reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Type Reference must be specified if including a Letter of Credit Reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Letter of Credit Document ID can not be specified without a Letter of Credit Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One or more Exception References specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Facilities and Award; a Facilities and Administration Exception can only be associated with one Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If specified, Letter of Credit's default currency must match Company's default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Entered differs from Company default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Authorized Amount cannot exceed the Sponsor change in Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Lines cannot be removed on Correct Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Lines cannot be removed on Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot submit Original Award Proposal on Submit Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Award_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Reference ID. This is the Award Unique Identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. Sponsor Award Types are tenanted data that can be used for categorizing Awards.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Purpose_Code_Reference" type="wd:Award_Purpose_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Purpose Code for the Award. type="wd:Payment_TermsObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Terms Reference for Customer Contract</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Institutional_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Institutional ID</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Related_Award_Reference" type="wd:Award_ContractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For information purposes only, an Award "related" to the current one worktag of each type is allowed</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one worktag of each type is allowed</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Remove these worktag types that aren't valid for this transaction: [list of worktag types].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Lifecycle_Status_Reference" type="wd:Award_Lifecycle_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Lifecycle Status for Award</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The award header lifecycle status is invalid.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The award header lifecycle status is invalid.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Sub_Award" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not this Award is a sub-contracted award. If set to TRUE, a Flow Through Sponsor must also be specified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Flow_Through_Sponsor_Reference" type="wd:SponsorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The sponsor who is the ultimate funding source for the Award. This field is only required for sub-awards.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Sponsor_Reference" type="wd:SponsorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Sponsor with whom the Award is Contracted.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, if there is non-canceled Award Costing for any of the Grants on the Award, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, if there is non-canceled Award Costing for any of the Grants on the Award, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Bill_To_Sponsor_Reference" type="wd:SponsorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Sponsor who should be billed for transactions against this award.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Bill-To-Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, or if there are approved or in-progress Customer Invoices for the award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Bill-To-Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, or if there are approved or in-progress Customer Invoices for the award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Type Reference for Customer Contract</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Letter_Of_Credit_Reference" type="wd:Letter_Of_CreditObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Letter of Credit which will be drawn from to pay for Cost Reimbursable expenditures against this award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Letter_of_Credit_Document_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Document ID used to reference this award for Letter of Credit collection. This field is required if Letter of Credit is entered.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Entered differs from Company default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Sponsor_Direct_Cost_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The direct cost that will be billed to the sponsor for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Sponsor_Facilities_and_Administration_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The indirect costs that will be billed to the sponsor for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Cost_Share_Total_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The obligated cost share amount for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Authorized_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The maximum amount authorized for billing and collection for transactions against this award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Limit_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Billing Limit Override for the Award. If this value is non-zero, Cost Reimbursable billing for this award will not exceed this value. Otherwise, the Authorized Amount will be used as the Billing Limit.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Cost_Share_Required_by_Sponsor" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the Sponsor requires Cost Share for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Anticipated_Sponsor_Direct_Cost_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The total anticipated Sponsor Direct Cost for the life of the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Anticipated_Facilities_and_Administration_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The total anticipated Sponsor indirect cost for the life of the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Award_Schedule_Reference" type="wd:Award_ScheduleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Schedule. This schedule will also be used in an Award Budget for the award if one is made.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CFDA_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Description of CFDA program</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="NSF_Code_Reference" type="wd:NSF_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>NSF Code</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Proposal_Version" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Proposal Version</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" type="wd:Award_Attachment_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Award_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Award reference for update Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot use inactive Revenue Category</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot use inactive Revenue cannot change in Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktags are required but have not been assigned: [missing].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktag types are invalid: [invalid].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You cannot include the Line Status on the Submit Award web service. Please remove the Line Status reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference" type="wd:Receivable_Contract_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Receivable Contract Line for update only purposes.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Receivable Contract Line Reference ID. You can either update an existing award line on this award or create a new award line for this award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Number"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line Number</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Number cannot change in Correct Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Number cannot change in Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="4"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Intercompany_Affiliate_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id for the award line company. The line company must be part of the header company's intercompany profile.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Line company with different currency from header company not allowed for award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Line company [line company] with currency [line company currency] not allowed for award with header company [hdr company] with currency [hdr company currency]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Set up an intercompany relationship between header and line company using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Set up an intercompany relationship between [hdr company] and [line company] using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Company and award header company must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Company [line company] and award header company [header company] must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Revenue_Category_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the revenue category. A revenue category is a classification of services that drive the accounting, and indicates the types of services this Award line is intended to represent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Revenue Category cannot be changed in Correct Award if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award Category cannot be changed in Correct Award if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award costing for the grant on the line, or there are invoices created for the line, or the award cost processing job is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Lifecycle_Status_Reference" type="wd:Award_Lifecycle_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Lifecycle Status for Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status, [line lifecycle status], combination with award lifecycle status [header lifecycle status], is not permitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Line_Type_Reference" type="wd:Contract_Line_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Line Type for the Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Type cannot be changed in Correct Award if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Type cannot be changed in Correct Award if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost Reimbursable line has an approved Billing Schedule, or there is non-canceled Award Costing for the Grants on the line, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description_Override" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A description of the Award Line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean Flag indicating whether or not the revenue for the award line is deferred. Cannot be used for cost-reimbursable billing.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Line_Status_Reference" type="wd:Document_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line Status for Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Contract Line Amount of zero to cancel the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't cancel the Contract Line until invoices or revenue recognition finishes processing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Grant" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award contract line is the primary line for the award</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Grant_Reference" type="wd:GrantObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Grant for the Award Line. line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Award_Line_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Valid lines can be seen in the UI for the Schedule using the Maintain Contract Lines button.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please add only valid contract lines to the schedule based on the Company, Customer and Contract Line Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot add or update an installment if the schedule Method is not Custom.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please set the Method to Custom if you are adding or updating installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot add or update installments and also request to Generate Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If Billing method is Custom, one and only one option may be chosen for: Use From Date, Use To Date, Use Number of Days before Start Date. If Billing Method is not Custom, one and only one option must be chosen for: Use From Date, Use To Date, Use Number of Days before Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If Invoice Uses To Date is entered, To Date must be entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A From Date must be entered when the Invoice Date Option is Use From Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>When billing method is not Custom, then From Date and either Number of Installments or To Date are required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Start Date must be before End Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Billing Frequency is required unless Billing Method is Custom.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Start Date can't be changed with completed installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Number of Installments can't be less than the number of Installments already completed or in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Frequency Behavior can't be changed with already completed Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>End Date can't be before the date of completed installments or installments in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>There must be at least 1 installment to submit the Billing Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The line's currency does not match schedule's currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract lines must contain the same billable project that is identified on the Billing Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Lines must not contain more than one Billing Types for a Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_Reference_ID" type="wd:Receivable_Contract_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing instances Contract Lines linked to this schedule.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Installment_Data" type="wd:Billing_Installment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billing Installment Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_Installment_Schedule_Data" type="wd:Customer_Contract_Schedule_Installment_Schedule_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Billing_Installment_Line_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Billing Schedule Installment Line data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Installment lines must refer to a contract line which is already linked to the line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Order" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line order</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Overrride_Line" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override Line flag. Use this to specify values on the installment line instead of using values derived from either the installment, the schedule, or the contract line. This must be on to specify overrides.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot provide invoice line overrides unless Installment Override is ON.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Contract_Line_Reference" type="wd:Installment_ItemObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of a contract line linked to this installment line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line Item description</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Quantity"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Quantity. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="22"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Unit_of_Measure_Reference" type="wd:Unit_of_MeasureObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unit of measure. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Quantity_2"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Quantity 2. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="22"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Unit_of_Measure_2_Reference" type="wd:Unit_of_MeasureObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unit of Measure 2. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Unit_Cost"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unit Price. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Amount. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>From Date. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Applicability_Reference" type="wd:Tax_ApplicabilityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Tax Applicability.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Tax Code.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Deferred Revenue flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Memo. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Billing_Installment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Billing Schedule Installment Data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>You may not update installments with status Canceled, Completed, or In Progress.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot update an installment if its status is Canceled, Completed, or In Progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Billing Installment Line Data is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Installment_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Billing Installment Reference ID. Due Date is read-only and the system derives it based on Payment Terms.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment From date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment To date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="On_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment On Hold flag</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Total_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment Amount</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Milestone_Reference" type="wd:Milestone_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Milestone</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Date_Milestone_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Override_Invoice_Header" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override Invoice Header flag. name="Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Revenue Recognition Schedule data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot add or update installments and also request to Generate Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contract Lines may be added to the schedule, but cannot be removed.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please include all existing contract lines when adding a contract line to the schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line(s) being added are not valid for Schedule. Valid lines can be seen in the UI for the Schedule using the Maintain Contract Lines button.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please add only valid contract lines to the schedule based on the Company, Customer and Contract Line Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot add or update an installment if the schedule Method is not Custom.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please set the Method to Custom if you are adding or updating installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Ledger periods are required for all installments within the selected schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Start Date can't be changed with completed installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Start Date must be before End Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Frequency Behavior can't be changed with already completed Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Number of Installments can't be less than the number of Installments already completed or in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>End Date can't be before the date of completed installments or installments in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The invoice date of all invoice first lines must be within the schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The invoice date of all invoice first lines must be within the schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoices can't have lines that belong to more than one Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoice can't be submitted until its lines' Documents are Approved.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>All Customer Invoice Lines added to Revenue Recognition Schedules need to have their Deferred Revenue flag checked.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is controlled by Contracts yet has lines not pertaining to Contracts.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is controlled by Awards yet has lines not pertaining to Awards.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is controlled by Customer Invoices yet has lines not pertaining to Customer Invoices.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Revenue Recognition Schedule controlled by Customer Invoice can only have Lines pertaining to a single Customer Invoice.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoices need to have all of their Customer Invoices Lines being non-intercompany.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoices need have their lines' Company match the Revenue Recognition Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Revenue Recognition Schedule's controlling transaction cannot be changed once set.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Must enter a Revenue Recognition Controlling Transaction or at least one Line when submitting a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is already pertaining to a certain Customer Invoice Document. Create a new one to associate it to the referred Customer Invoice Line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>There must be at least 1 installment to submit the Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Revenue Recognition Schedule Reference ID. This is the unique Revenue Recognition Schedule identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit flag. The service will attempt to submit the schedule if this is on.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Generate_Installments" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Generate Installments flag. The service will generate revenue recognition installments if this is set to true. You cannot generate installments if using a Custom schedule distribution method.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You cannot generate installments if using a Custom schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't generate installments for Transaction type schedules.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can’t generate installments for Percent Complete schedules.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_Status_Reference" type="wd:Document_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule status.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" Type</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule currency.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule company.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If any line is linked to the schedule, the company may not be changed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Intercompany_Header_Company_Reference" Schedule's Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the the customer may not be changed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_Type_Reference" type="wd:Schedule_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the Schedule Type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_On_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Schedule On Hold flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Schedule Description.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Milestone_Reference" type="wd:Milestone_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing milestones linked to this schedule. Schedule processing is contingent upon these milestones being met.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Date_Milestone_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>At Least One Milestone has an Invalid Customer or Sponsor</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Amount_Distribution_Method_Reference" type="wd:Schedule_Distribution_MethodObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the Amount Distribution method for Revenue Recognition.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Frequency_Reference" type="wd:Frequency_BehaviorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule Revenue Recognition Frequency.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>From date. The system generates installments based on this value.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The end dates of all customer contract lines must be between the Schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The end dates of all customer contract lines must be between the Schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>To date. The system generates installments based on this value.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Number_of_Installments"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Number of installments. type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Facilities and Administration Exception reference element used to name="Facilities_and_Admin_ExceptionType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes all data for a single Facilities and Administration ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Facilities and Administration Exception (Exception: [exception])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot delete the Facilities and Administration exception detail reference because the exception is referenced on an approved Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Facilities and Admin Exception Type entered must be valid for use on F&A Exceptions.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception should provide an Override F&A Rate, then the Override F&A Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception should provide a Waive Rate, then the Waive Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception is configured to waive Facilities and Admin costs, it must have an associated Waived Expense Allocation Profile.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the unique identifier for F&A Exception.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing the F&A Exception inside the Workday application.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Exception_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the F&A Exception.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Basis_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Basis_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing F&A Basis Type. Basis Type identifies the valid set of Object Classes to be used for this F&A Exception.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The primary type for the F&A Exception. If an exception type indicating an Facilities and Administration rate override is selected, every transaction against the award will use the primary rate on the exception for Facilities and Administration calculations, unless a Facilities and Administration Exception Detail for the Object Class for the Transaction specifies another rate to use. If an exception type indicating an Facilities and Administration waive rate is selected, every transaction against the award will use the primary waive rate on the exception for Facilities and Administration calculations, unless a Facilities and Administration Exception Detail for the Object Class for the Transaction specifies another waive rate to use.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Waive_Rate"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile which allocates costs for Facilities and Administration Excptions that waive any portion Facilities and Administration costs.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Exception_Detail_Data" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element containing exception rates by object class.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element containing F&A Exception rates based on object class.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Facilities and Administration Exception Detail Data cannot be changed because it is referenced by an approved or amended Award. (Exception: [exception]; Object Class: [object])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Object Class has already been specified for this exception. Object class must be unique per exception. (Object class: [object])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Object Class specified is not valid for the Basis Type. Only object classes defined for the Basis Type are allowed. (Object Class: [object])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Facilities and Admin Exception Type entered must be valid for use on Facilities and Admin Exception Details.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail should provide an Override Rate, then the Override Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail should provide a Waive Rate, then the Waive Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_Detail_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_DetailObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This reference for the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail for update. If no reference specified, a new reference will be created.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Object_Class_Reference" type="wd:Object_ClassObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Object Class. Only Object Classes defined on the Basis Type referenced in the Facilities and Admin Exception Data are valid.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Facilities and Administration Exception Type for the Exception Detail. The rate at which Facilities and Administration is calculated and/or waived can be overridden at the Object Class level. If an exception type that overrides the Facilities and Administration rate is chosen, transactions against and award line that have the object class for the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail will use the rate specified on the exception detail for Facilities and Administration calculations. If an exception type that waives Facilities and Administration is chosen, transactions against and award line that have the object class for the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail will use the rate specified on the exception detail calculating waived Facilities and Administration.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate for the Object Class reference as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Waive_Rate"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate for the Object Class reference as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Facilities and Admin Exception reference for update and Exception Detail data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Facilities and Administration Exception already exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Exception Name with the Basis Type is already in use.
