Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the response data for the Put Facilities and Administration Exception request</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_ExceptionObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Facilities and Administration Exception that was created or updated by the Put request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sponsor_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element around a list of elements representing the amount of data that should be included in the Sponsor response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Sponsor reference is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Sponsor_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Sponsor data is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sponsor_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This Element contains Sponsor relationships and attributes</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The default payment type selected requires a Settlement Bank Account. Please enter the appropriate Settlement Bank Account information.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Sponsor Name must match Business Entity Name.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one active Settlement Bank Account allowed for the given entity.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A specific alternate name usage can only be used once per business entity</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Two Reference ID's have been provided that resolve to different instances. Please provide only one Reference ID or verify that both Reference ID's resolve to the same instance.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Business Entity Data is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Business Entity to create from is only applicable when creating a Customer, not updating an existing Customer</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more of the Sponsor Children provided belong to another Sponsor Hierarchy. element for the list of criteria representing the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile specific criteria needed to search for instances.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains all the data necessary to describe a Facilities and Administration has the same name.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Total Percent must equal 100.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile ID. A unique reference for the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" type="wd:Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Distribution_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Distribution name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element Containing data for adding or updating a Facilities and Administration for update only purposes.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_Data" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains the response information for a Put Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile Request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile that was created or updated for the request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Worktag_Offset_Override_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains Worktag Override information for a single worktag offset for a single allocation distribution for a Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile Data. If an Expense against an award line has waived F&A, and it is tagged with a worktag with a worktag type that is overridden in this distribution, then the accounting that is generated for the non-sponsored portion of the expense for this distribution will replace the original worktag with the worktag defined in this override.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Accounting_Worktag_Type_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_Worktag_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Accounting Worktag Type for the Worktag Offset Override. If the source transaction against the award line contains a worktag of this type, The non-sponsored cost generatd for this distribution will replace the original worktag with the offsetting worktag.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Type that isn't already in use.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Worktag Type: [wtt] is invalid for use on Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Distribution</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Worktag_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The worktag that will be used as an override for the non-sponsored cost accounting generated for this distribution.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Balancing Worktag Type: [balancingWT] must not be left blank.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Worktag Override for Worktag Type: Fund that doesn't have a fund type funded by a sponsor.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Accounting Worktag:[worktag] must be for the Accounting Worktag Type:[accounting worktag type].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Distribution_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains data describing a single distribution in the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Each Expense Distribution must include a Worktag Override for the Worktag Type: Fund</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Allocation_Distribution_Percent"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Allocation Distribution percent for this distribution. This percentage of the non-sponsor expense will be allocated to the worktags defined in this distribution.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expnese_Worktag_Offest_Override_Data" type="wd:Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Worktag_Offset_Override_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Worktag Offset Override Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Basis_Limit_Edit_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains information for the Facilities and Administration Basis Limit for the Award Line, and is frequently used restricting Facilities and Administration calculations on sub-contracted Award Lines. A Basis Limit can restrict Facilities and Administration calculations for one or more award lines. A Basis Limit cannot be used across multiple awards. To enter a Basis Limit that applies to more than one award line, enter the same Basis Limit Name and Basis Limit Amount on the Basis Limit Data element of each award line in the request. Each unique combination of Basis Limit Name and Basis Limit Amount will result in the creation of a single basis limit object.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Basis Limit Name must be filled. Basis Limit Amount cannot be zero.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Basis_Limit_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the Basis Limit for the award line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Basis_Limit_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The maximum cost basis that is eligible for Facilities and Administration calculations for the Award Line or group of Award Lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="14"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, or if there are approved or in-progress Customer Invoices for the This field is required if Letter of Credit is entered.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Entered differs from Company default currency.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Entered differs value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Limit_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Billing Limit Override for the name="Award_Contract_Amendment_Line_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award amendment data including award contract and award contract line data being amended.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Line Amount not required for Contract Line Type Types</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Exception not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Rate Type not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Allocation not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Rate Agreement Reference and Exception Reference must have the same Facilities and Administration Basis Type.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement Reference and Exception Reference must have the same Facilities and Administration Basis Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Rate Agreement Reference is required in order to specify an Exception Reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement Reference is required in order to specify an Exception Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Rate Type Reference is required if a Rate Agreement Reference is specified.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Revenue Allocation Profile Reference is required if a Rate Agreement Reference is specified.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Allocation Profile Reference is required if a Rate Agreement Reference is specified.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Rate Type Reference must be valid for the specified Rate Agreement Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement Reference is required in order to specify a Cost Rate Type Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Overlapping Grant / Date combination exists between contract lines.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Overlapping Grant / Date combination exists between contract lines.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Line Type Reference must be one of Cost Reimbursable, Prepaid or Fixed Amount</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line End Date must be greater than Start Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line End Date must be greater than Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Data contains duplicate Receivable Contract Line Reference ID's.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Data contains duplicate Receivable Contract Line Reference ID's.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Line Amount required for Fixed Amount Line Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot use inactive Revenue Category</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One or more Grants specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Grant can only be defined on one Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more Grants specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Grant can only be defined on one Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktags are required but have not been assigned: [missing].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktag types are invalid: [invalid].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference" type="wd:Receivable_Contract_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Receivable Contract Line Abstract for Award Contract Amendment Line Data Reference</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference_ID" This is the Receivable Contract Line unique identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Number"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line Number</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Award Line Number cannot be changed in an amendment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Award Line Number cannot be changed in an amendment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="4"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Intercompany_Affiliate_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id for the award line company. The line company must be part of the header company's intercompany profile.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Set up an intercompany relationship between header and line company using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Set up an intercompany relationship between [hdr company] and [line company] using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Line company with different currency from header company not allowed for award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Line company [line company] with currency [line company currency] not allowed for award with header company [hdr company] with currency [hdr company currency]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active billing schedule. Change the billing schedule status first.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active billing schedule. Change the billing schedule status first.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active revenue recognition schedule. Change the revenue recognition schedule status first.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active revenue recognition schedule. Change the revenue recognition schedule status first.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Company and award header company must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Company [line company] and award header company [header company] must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Revenue_Category_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the revenue category. A revenue category is a classification of services that drive the accounting, and indicates the types of services this Award line is intended to represent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Revenue_Category_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Revenue Category cannot be changed in amendment if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award costing for the grant on the line, or there are invoices created for the line, or the award cost processing job is currently running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Revenue Category cannot be changed in amendment if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award costing for the grant on the line, or there are invoices created for the line, or the award cost processing job is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Lifecycle_Status_Reference" type="wd:Award_Lifecycle_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Lifecycle Status for Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status, [line lifecycle status], combination with award lifecycle status [header lifecycle status], is not permitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Line_Type_Reference" type="wd:Contract_Line_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Line Type for the Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Type cannot be changed in an Amendment if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost Reimbursable line has an approved Billing Schedule, or there is non-canceled Award Costing for the Grants on the line, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Type cannot be changed in an Amendment if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost Reimbursable line has an approved Billing Schedule, or there is non-canceled Award Costing for the Grants on the line, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A description of the Award Line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean Flag indicating whether or not the revenue for the award line is deferred. Cannot be used for cost-reimbursable billing.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Deferred Revenue cannot be changed in an amendment if the Line has an approved customer invoice line application or is on a non-cancelled revenue recognition schedule.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Deferred Revenue cannot be changed in an amendment if the Line has an approved customer invoice line application or is on a non-cancelled revenue recognition schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Prepaid line must have deferred Revenue</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Reimburable Line cannot have deferred Revenue</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Grant" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award contract line is the primary line for the award</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Grant_Reference" type="wd:GrantObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award contract line is the primary line for the award</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Grant cannot be assigned to the line company because has commitments, obligations, or actual postings against it for another company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Grant cannot be assigned to the line company because has commitments, obligations, or actual postings against for another company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Grant [grant] cannot be assigned to line company [line company] because it has commitments, obligations, or actual postings against it for another company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line Amount</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Rate_Agreement_Reference" This rate agreement will be considered when calculating Facilities and Administration charges for expenses against this line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Cost_Rate_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Cost_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Cost Rate Type for the Award Line. Please specify another.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Inactive" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Award Proposal Submission Type Inactive flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Award Proposal Submission Type reference for update (or empty if a new Award Proposal Submission Type is being added).</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Flag as an error the condition where an already-existing award proposal submission type is sent in add-only mode.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Web Service is set to Add Only, but the Award Proposal Submission Type already exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_Reference" type="wd:Award_Proposal_Submission_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Award Proposal Submission Type for update purposes only.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_Data" type="wd:Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Proposal Submission Type Data for the single award proposal submission type being created or updated.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag.
