The conversion rate cannot be 0 for a foreign currency transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Can't change a Customer Invoice once tied a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Intercompany Supplier Invoice cannot be created for this customer invoice. Check supplier for company, currency setup, and a positive total.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Intercompany Supplier Invoice cannot be created for this customer invoice. Check supplier for company, currency setup, and a positive total.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice ID. This is the Customer Invoice unique identifier</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the invoice inside the Workday application. Invoice can only be updated from the web service.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the company that tranasction is for. This is the reference id value of the company.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency must be specified or Company must have a default Currency</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency must be specified or Company must have a default Currency</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency entered is not listed as an Accepted Currency by Customer.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency entered is not listed as an Accepted Currency by Customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the customer that the invoice is for. This is the reference id value of the customer</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Company represented by Customer cannot match the transaction Company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Company represented by Customer cannot match the transaction Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Bill_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If left blank and the invoice is created from a billing schedule, the bill-to address will default from the billing schedule. Otherwise it will take the primary billing address if one exists.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't enter a Bill-To Address unless the billable entity is a customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a valid Bill-To Address for this customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Populate_with_Default_Bill_To_Contacts" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>When Populate with Default Bill-To Contacts is set to true, it will populate Bill To Contact with the Default Values.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Bill_To_Contact_Reference" type="wd:Business_Entity_ContactObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billable Entity Contact for Customer Invoice. Contact must be related to Billable Entity and have an Invoice Email Address.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contact must be related to Billable Entity and have an Invoice Email Address.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Contact must be related to Billable Entity and have an Invoice Email Address.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Bill_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Bill-To_Address_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Address information data for the Bill-To Address</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Customer_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>reference id value of the default ship-to customer</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer that is part of the Customer's Connection Map.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>reference id value of the default ship-to address</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer first before entering a Ship-To Address Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Ship-To Address you entered is not valid for this Ship-To Customer. If you did not enter a Ship-To Customer, Workday chose the default for this Sold-To Customer for you, and this Ship-To Address is not valid for that customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Address_Information_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Billable_Project_Reference" type="wd:ProjectObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the project. If there is a value, Workday will first validate that it is a billable project. If the project has a company or customer specified, Workday will validate that these match with the company and customer that the invoice is for. Billable project is an "implicit" project worktag value for all invoice lines so Workday will also validate that no invoice lines have an explicit project worktag value</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Invoice_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If adding a new invoice, then make the Invoice Number the same value as Reference ID. If updating an existing invoice, then make it the same value as the Reference ID of that invoice. If you do not make the Invoice Number the same as Reference ID, then duplicate Invoice Numbers for different invoices may be created. The Reference ID is the only value checked as a unique identifier. Note that the name of the Reference ID is different for each invoice type: e.g. Supplier Invoice ID, Supplier Invoice Adjustment ID, Customer Invoice Adjustment ID, and Customer Invoice ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Invoice_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If this is left blank, Workday will populate invoice date with the current date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Accounting_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override date for Accounting.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>'Allow Accounting in Arrears' is not permitted for this company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a date in an open period.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Date is required for this Company. Enter an Accounting Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Date not allowed for direct intercompany customer invoices.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'From Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not greater than 'To Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'To Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not less than 'From Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Due_Date_Override" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY.
If a date is provided, it will override the due date that Workday automatically determines based on the invoice date and payment terms.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Due Date must not be earlier than Invoice Date</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Due Date must not be earlier than Invoice Date</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Collection_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice is put into collection. If this field is populated when updating an existing invoice, the invoice will be put into collection.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Amount_Promised"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The amount the customer promised to pay when the Customer Invoice is put into collection. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment amount promised cannot be greater than the amount due.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Promise to pay amount can only be entered if there is a collection date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Collection_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Collection_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reason the Customer Invoice is put into collection. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Collection Code can only be entered if there is a collection date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Followup_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice should be followed up. This field is optional and can be entered in maintain collection, maintain dispute or put on hold.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The invoice must either be in collection, dispute, or on hold to enter a followup date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Followup date cannot be in the past.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice is put into dispute. If this field is populated when updating an existing invoice, the invoice will be put into dispute.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The amount the Customer Invoice is in dispute over. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Dispute amount cannot be greater than the amount due.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A dispute amount can only be entered if there is a dispute date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Dispute_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reason the Customer Invoice is put into dispute.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A dispute reason can only be entered if there is a dispute date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Control_Amount_Total"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the expected invoice total including tax. It is optional. An invoice cannot be submittted for approval if it has a non-zero control total that does not equal the sum of the extended amount for all invoice lines plus tax.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Terms_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TermsObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of the payment terms for the invoice. Payment Terms are the rules for establishing when a invoice payment is due and whether discounts are eligible to be taken or given for early payment. This is a required field, but if no payment terms are specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment terms if one is defined. Workday will automatically determine the due date and discount date based on the invoice date and payment terms.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A payment term with a discount is not allowed when the VAT on Payment option is turned on for the Company</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Terms is Required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the payment type for the transaction and needs to be the reference id value of the payment type. Payment Type establishes methods of making payments, such as cash, check, or electronic transfer. Workday supplies the payment methods. Usually there is a one-to-one relationship between payment type (which you define) and Workday's provided payment methods. If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined. Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection would be initiated by Workday.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Shows the Customer Invoice Document's Payment Status.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Document_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Document Status for Customer Invoice</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Amount_Due"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Shows a Customer Invoice Document's Due Amount, assuming it is not cancelled.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Type_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Reference ID of Customer Invoice Type which is used to help categorize invoices as well as determine the invoice layout that is used for the printed invoice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If this is blank, Workday will default in the default tax code from the invoice header if there is one. If the invoice line has a tax applicability value, Workday will validate that the invoice line also has a tax code.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tax Code can't be set if you enabled Third Party Tax Service for this company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_PO_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This PO number will print on the delivered customer invoice. It is optional freeform text. This is not a Workday Purchase Order Reference ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="On_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>TRUE or FALSE If this is set to 'TRUE' the invoice will be put on hold.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Customer_Worktags" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Include Default Customer Worktags if this flag is TRUE</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Worktags_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize. Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>[list of worktag types] not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction header memo will print on the delivered transaction. It is optional freeform text</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Type_Override_Reference" type="wd:Currency_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice, this allows you to override the default Rate Type used to look up the currency conversion rate.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Date_Override" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice, this allows you to override the date used to look up the currency conversion rate. The default date is normally the same as the invoice date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Manual_Override_Reference"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice, this allows you to directly override the currency conversion rate that will be used.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Calculation_Details" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text field to summarize Tax Calculation Details.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Enable the Use Third Party Tax Service setting for the Company first to set the Tax Calculation Details.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Use Third Party Tax Service is not enabled for: [company].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Line_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Line_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Encapsulating element containing Customer Invoice Line data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Data" type="wd:Taxable_Code_Application_NO_INPUT_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Tax Data by Tax Authority and Tax Code. For Customer Invoice Documents and Cash Sales tax data will always be calculated from the line data regardless of what is populated in Tax Rate Application Data. For Purchase Orders, Supplier Invoice Documents and Ad hoc Payments, if data is in Tax Rate Application Data, then that will be the tax information that is saved. Otherwise, the tax will be calculated from the lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Attachment_Data" type="wd:Financials_Attachment_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Note_Data" type="wd:Note_WWS_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Intercompany_Sub_Process" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Intercompany_Sub_ProcessType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sales_Item_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing reference instances for a Sales Item</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Sales_Item_Reference" type="wd:Sales_ItemObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the sales item. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sales_Item_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Sales Item request criteria</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sales_Item_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Sales Item response grouping options</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Include Reference</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Sales_Items_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains request reference, criteria, filter and response group for getting Sales Item data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Sales_Item_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Request References</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Sales_Item_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Request Criteria</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Response Filter</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Sales_Item_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Response Group</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sales_ItemType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes Sales Item Instance and Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item_Reference" type="wd:Sales_ItemObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the sales item. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item_Data" type="wd:Sales_Item_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Sales Item Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sales_Item_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes Sales Item Instance and Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item" type="wd:Sales_ItemType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Sales Item</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Sales_Items_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Sales Item response elements including received criteria, references, data based on criteria and grouping, results filter and result summary</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Sales_Item_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Request References</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Sales_Item_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Request Criteria</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Response Filter</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Sales_Item_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Response Group</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Results" type="wd:Response_ResultsType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Response Results</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Data" type="wd:Sales_Item_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Get Sales Items Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Sales_Item_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Sales Item reference for update and all Sales Item data items</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Web Service is set to Add Only; but the Sales Item already exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item_Reference" type="wd:Sales_ItemObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Sales Item for update only purposes</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Sales_Item_Data" type="wd:Sales_Item_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Sales Item Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Sales_Item_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Put Sales Item Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item_Reference" type="wd:Sales_ItemObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the sales item. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Invoice_Line_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice Line Data. A Customer Invoice may have multiple lines.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one worktag for each type is allowed for each document line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one worktag for each type is allowed for each document line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Please specify an Item or a Spend Category.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please specify an Item or a Spend Category.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Revenue Category must match the Revenue Category for the Sales Item if that category is active.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category must match the Revenue Category for the Sales Item if that category is active.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line is not valid for this Customer Invoice Line. To be valid, the Customer Contract Line must be approved.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer Contract Line is not valid for this Customer Invoice Line. To be valid, the Customer Contract Line must be approved.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Invoice Line Revenue Category must be equal to Customer Contract Line Revenue Category.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Invoice Line Revenue Category must be equal to Customer Contract Line Revenue Category.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line's Bill-To Customer and Currency must match Customer Invoice Header Customer and Currency.
If Billable Project is entered on the Contract Line, it must match the Billable Project in the Invoice header.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Line's Bill-To Customer and Currency must match Customer Invoice Header Customer and Currency.
If Billable Project is entered on the Contract Line, it must match the Billable Project in the Invoice header.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot have an Employee Worktag along with a Contingent Worker Worktag for the same line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot have an Employee Worktag along with a Contingent Worker Worktag for the same line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Invoice Line transaction date must be within From/To header dates.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Invoice Line transaction date must be within From/To header dates.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Invoice Line from/to date must be within Invoice Header from/to date</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Invoice Line from/to date must be within Invoice Header from/to date</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot enter Project Worktag on an Invoice Line with a Billable Project entered on the header.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot enter Project Worktag on an Invoice Line with a Billable Project entered on the header.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Combination of Billable Project, Project Phase and Project Task is not allowed. Please ensure if phase and/or task are entered they are valid for the Billable Project entered.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Combination of Billable Project, Project Phase and Project Task is not allowed. Please ensure if phase and/or task are entered they are valid for the Billable Project entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>For a Contract Line that is not Project Time and Expense, the Invoice Line Company must match the Contract Line’s Company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>For a Contract Line that is not Project Time and Expense, the Invoice Line Company must match the Contract Line’s Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line Company must match Customer Invoice Header Company .</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Line Company must match Customer Invoice Header Company .</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following worktag types are present on both the Invoice Header and on the Invoice Line : [types]. The same worktag type can not be on both.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If a Revenue Category is entered as a Customer Invoice Header Worktag, then the revenue categories for the sales item or revenue category on all of the Customer Invoice lines must be of the same revenue category.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category does not match Revenue Category in Customer Invoice Header Worktags.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Can not have both a Contingent Worker and Employee Worktag on the Invoice Header and Line Worktag</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Can not use a Sales Item that is a basic worktag only as the sales item for the transaction.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Can not use a Sales Item that is a basic worktag only as the sales item for the transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Sales Item is inactive.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Sales Item is inactive.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot submit a customer invoice or cash sale with an intercompany line that has a 0 amount.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot submit a customer invoice or cash sale with an intercompany line that has a 0 amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project Task worktags for the same line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project Task worktags for the same line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot enter Project Phase Worktag on an Invoice Line with a Billable Project entered on the header.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot enter Project Phase Worktag on an Invoice Line with a Billable Project entered on the header.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project Task on the Invoice Header and Invoice Line worktags.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project Task on the Invoice Header and Invoice Line worktags.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot enter Project Task Worktag on an Invoice Line with a Billable Project entered on the header.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot enter Project Task Worktag on an Invoice Line with a Billable Project entered on the header.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Invoice Line From Date must be on or before Invoice Line To Date</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Invoice Line From Date must be on or before Invoice Line To Date</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a balancing worktag for Worktags of the following type: [type]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Deferred Revenue and Contract Line are mutually exclusive. If Deferred Revenue is specified then this Customer Invoice must not have a Contract.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Deferred Revenue and Contract Line are mutually exclusive. If Deferred Revenue is specified then this Customer Invoice must not have a Contract.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules are only to be tied to Customer Invoice Lines via Revenue Recognition Create(UI) or via Submit(Web Service).</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot use inactive Revenue Category</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot use inactive Revenue Category</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can identify a project in either the Worktags field or the Billable Project field, but not both.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The billable project you enter on the invoice line must match the project on the invoice header.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Line_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Line for update only purposes.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Line_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Customer Invoice Line Reference ID. This is the Customer Invoice Line unique identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Order" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Optional line order. If specified, lines will be sorted by this value when displayed and when invoice is printed.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Intercompany_Affiliate_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the Company. If this is blank, Workday will default the company from the invoice header. If a value is provided that is different from the invoice header, workday validates that there is an appropriate intercompany relationship configured.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The company is not configured for intercompany transactions with the company specified</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>[2] is not configured to allow intercompany transactions with [1]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Company on the line must be the same as Company on the document for intercompany customers.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Company on the line must be the same as Company on the document for intercompany customers.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item_Reference" type="wd:Sales_ItemObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the sales item. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The sales item is not mapped to a purchase item.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Category_Reference" type="wd:Revenue_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the spend category. A spend category is a classification of items and services that drive the accounting. All expense items are associated with a Spend Category and sales items are associated with a Revenue Category. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both. It is required if sales item is blank.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The revenue category is not mapped to a spend category.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the description that will print on the customer invoice. If it is blank, the system will print the sales item name if the invoice line has one, otherwise it will print the revenue category name</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Customer_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference ID of the Ship-To Customer on the line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer that is part of the Customer's Connection Map.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Ship-To Address Reference for the Ship-To Address on the Customer Invoice Line.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer first before entering a Ship-To Address Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Ship-To Address you entered is not valid for this Ship-To Customer. If you did not enter a Ship-To Customer, Workday chose the default for this Sold-To Customer for you, and this Ship-To Address is not valid for that customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Address_Information_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Applicability_Reference" type="wd:Tax_ApplicabilityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax applicability. If this is blank and there invoice line has a sales item, Workday will default tax applicability from the sales item. If the invoice line has a tax code then tax applicability is required.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tax Applicability Reference is required if Tax Code Reference is provided.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tax Applicability can't be set if you enabled Third Party Tax Service for this Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If this is blank, Workday will default in the default tax code from the invoice header if there is one. If the invoice line has a tax applicability value, Workday will validate that the invoice line also has a tax code.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tax Code can't be set if you enabled Third Party Tax Service for this company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Contract_Line_Reference" type="wd:Receivable_Contract_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of the contract line. Workday will validate that the company and customer for the contract line match the company and customer that the invoice is for. In addition, if a billable project is specified in the invoice header, Workday will validate that the contract line references this billable project. Not Applicable for Cash Sale.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Quantity"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If this is blank, Workday will assume a value of 1. If invoice line has a quantity and unit price, then Workday will automatically calculate extended amount. But if the line references either a Service or Project-Based Purchase Order or Contract Line, the quantity must be blank and extended amount will not be calculated.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Quantity must be greater than zero and cannot be partial when the document line's spend category is Tracked (unless related to a supplier contract line).</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Quantity must be greater than zero and cannot be partial when the document line's spend category is Tracked (unless related to a supplier contract line).</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="22"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Unit_of_Measure_Reference" type="wd:Unit_of_MeasureObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference ID of the primary Unit of Measure for the Customer Invoice Line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Quantity_2"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Second Quantity for Invoice Line, corresponding to the secondary Unit of Measure.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The primary Quantity field is required if Quantity 2 is provided.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The primary Quantity field is required if Quantity 2 is provided.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="22"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Unit_of_Measure_2_Reference" type="wd:Unit_of_MeasureObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The second Unit of Measure for the Customer Invoice Line.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Quantity 2 is required if Unit of Measure 2 is provided.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Quantity 2 is required if Unit of Measure 2 is provided.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Unit_Cost"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Unit Price. If this is blank, Workday will default the unit price from the item if one is configured. If invoice line has a quantity and unit price, then Workday will automatically calculate extended amount.. But if the line references either a Service or Project-Based Purchase Order or Contract Line, the Unit Price must be blank.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Extended_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the invoice line amount. If the invoice line has a quantity and unit price, then Workday will automatically calculate extended amount.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Transaction_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. This will print on the delivered invoice formats for project time and project expense. There is no validation with any other dates in the invoice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. This will print in the date column of the delivered invoice format for project time. Workday will validate that 'From Date' is not greater than 'To Date' on this invoice line. There are no validations related to the from/to dates in the invoice header.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. This will print in the date column of the delivered invoice format for project time. Workday will validate that 'To Date' is not less than 'From Date' on this invoice line. There are no validations related to the from/to dates in the invoice header.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Billable_Project_Reference" type="wd:ProjectObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference ID for the billable project. Workday validates that the billable project is the same for the invoice line and the invoice header, and that the billable project is identified in either the Worktags field or the Billable Project field, but not both.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Project_Plan_Phase_Reference" type="wd:Project_Plan_PhaseObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of the project plan phase.
Workday will validate that there is a billable project in the invoice header and that the phase is valid for it. Additionally, Workday will validate that if there is a task, the phase is for that task (so recommendation is not to enter when a task is entered.
Not Applicable for Cash Sale.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Project_Plan_Task_Reference" type="wd:Project_Plan_TaskObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of the project plan task.
Workday will validate that there is a billable project in the invoice header and that the task is valid for it. Project phase will be derived from the task.
Not Applicable for Cash Sale.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This field is mutually exclusive with Contract Line. When present this field will be persisted to indicate that this Invoice has a Deferred Value independent of any Contract or Award. If present in Response this indicates that the returned invoice is not associated to a Contract or Award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_Reference" type="wd:ScheduleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Returns the Revenue Recognition Schedule tied to the Customer Invoice Line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Memo for the Invoice line. This is free form text.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Analytical_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Analytical Amount for the Line. This amount is informational only and is not used in any delivered Workday calculations.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Worktags_Reference" type="wd:Audited_Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize. Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>[list of worktag types] not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category is not a valid Worktag type for Customer Invoice Lines worktags.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>You have chosen an invalid combination of header company, line company, and intercompany affiliate.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The intercompany affiliate [worktag] may not be chosen when specifying header company [header company] and line company [line company].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Calculated_Tax_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Calculated Tax Amount to set for Taxable Document Line.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Enable the Use Third Party Tax Service setting for the Company first to set the Calculated Tax Amount.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Use Third Party Tax Service is not enabled for: [company].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_InvoiceType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes Customer Invoice Instance and Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_InvoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing all Customer Invoice Adjustment data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Please enter at least one invoice line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please enter at least one invoice line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The total extended amount of all lines must be greater than zero.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The total extended amount of all lines must be greater than zero.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only a Billable Project may be entered.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Only a Billable Project may be entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>To Date must be greater than From Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>To Date must be greater than From Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Only one worktag for each type is allowed for the Customer Invoice Header worktags.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one worktag for each type is allowed for the Customer Invoice Header worktags.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Project worktags are not allowed on the Customer Invoice header for a Customer Invoice with a Billable Project entered.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Project worktags are not allowed on the Customer Invoice header for a Customer Invoice with a Billable Project entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer is required for a Customer Invoice Adjustment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer is required for a Customer Invoice Adjustment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>When Worktag Balancing is enabled and the invoice total amount is zero, the invoice lines for each balancing worktag value must net to zero.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The currency conversion rate is 0 for the Date, Rate Type, or Manual Override provided, or the default rate is 0. The conversion rate cannot be 0 for a foreign currency transaction.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The currency conversion rate is 0 for the Date, Rate Type, or Manual Override provided, or the default rate is 0. The conversion rate cannot be 0 for a foreign currency transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Can't change a Customer Invoice once tied a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Intercompany Supplier Invoice Adjustment cannot be created for this Customer Invoice Adjustment . Check supplier for company, currency setup, and a positive total.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Intercompany Supplier Invoice Adjustment cannot be created for this Customer Invoice Adjustment . Check supplier for company, currency setup, and a positive total.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice Adjustment ID. This is the Customer Invoice Adjustment unique identifier</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the invoice inside the Workday application. Invoice can only be updated from the web service.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Invoice_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If adding a new invoice, then make the Invoice Number the same value as Reference ID. If updating an existing invoice, then make it the same value as the Reference ID of that invoice. If you do not make the Invoice Number the same as Reference ID, then duplicate Invoice Numbers for different invoices may be created. The Reference ID is the only value checked as a unique identifier. Note that the name of the Reference ID is different for each invoice type: e.g. Supplier Invoice ID, Supplier Invoice Adjustment ID, Customer Invoice Adjustment ID, and Customer Invoice ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the company that tranasction is for. This is the reference id value of the company.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the customer that the invoice is for. This is the reference id value of the customer</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Company represented by Customer cannot match the transaction Company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Company represented by Customer cannot match the transaction Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Populate_with_Default_Bill_To_Contacts" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>When Populate with Default Bill-To Contacts is set to true, it will populate Bill To Contact with the Default Values.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Bill_To_Contact_Reference" type="wd:Business_Entity_ContactObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billable Entity Contact for Customer Invoice. Contact must be related to Billable Entity and have an Invoice Email Address.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contact must be related to Billable Entity and have an Invoice Email Address.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Contact must be related to Billable Entity and have an Invoice Email Address.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Bill_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Bill-To address for Customer Invoice. If left blank, it will default to the primary billing address of the customer.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't enter a Bill-To Address unless the billable entity is a customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a valid Bill-To Address for this customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Bill_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Bill-To_Address_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Address Information Data for the Bill-To Address</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Customer_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>reference id for ship-to customer</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer that is part of the Customer's Connection Map.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>reference id for ship-to address</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer first before entering a Ship-To Address Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Ship-To Address you entered is not valid for this Ship-To Customer. If you did not enter a Ship-To Customer, Workday chose the default for this Sold-To Customer for you, and this Ship-To Address is not valid for that customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Address_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Billable_Project_Reference" type="wd:ProjectObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billable Project for Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Adjustment_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Invoice_Adjustment_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Adjustment Reason.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Increase_Amount_Due" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean flag for Increase Amount Due. In most cases, adjustments are used to decrease the amount due to the customer, in which case they are called credit memos. However, there are some circumstances where an adjustment is needed to increase the amount due. In this case, set this value.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Original_Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_InvoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Invoice that the Adjustment is for.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Original Invoice Customer must match the Customer on the Adjustment Invoice.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Original Invoice Customer must match the Customer on the Adjustment Invoice.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Auto-Apply_Adjustment_to_Invoice" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean flag to indicate that the Customer Invoice Adjustment should automatically be applied to the Customer Invoice once the Adjustment is approved. Only applies if "Increase Liability" is false, and a Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The boolean flag Auto-Apply Adjustment to Referenced Invoice can only be set to True if "Increase Amount Due" is False, and an Original Customer Invoice Reference is provided that has the same currency as the Customer Invoice Adjustment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot have a "Reference Invoice" specified and "Auto-Apply" set to true if the Reference Invoice already has one of the following in progress: Customer Payment Application, Customer Invoice Maintenance, Bad Debt Writeoff, or a different Customer Invoice Adjustment referencing the same invoice and set to Auto-Apply.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Clear the Auto-Apply Adjustment option because the reference invoice has the activity [activity] in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency entered is not listed as an Accepted Currency by Customer.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency entered is not listed as an Accepted Currency by Customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency must be specified or Company must have a default Currency</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency must be specified or Company must have a default Currency</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Adjustment_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Invoice Adjustment Date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Accounting_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override date for Accounting.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a date in an open period.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>'Allow Accounting in Arrears' is not permitted for this company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Date is required for this Company. Enter an Accounting Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Date not allowed for direct intercompany customer invoices.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'From Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not greater than 'To Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'To Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not less than 'From Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Due_Date_Override" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY.
If a date is provided, it will override the due date that Workday automatically determines based on the invoice date and payment terms.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Due Date must not be earlier than Invoice Date</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Due Date must not be earlier than Invoice Date</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Collection_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into collection. If this field is populated when updating an existing invoice, the invoice adjustment will be put into collection.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot be put into collection if it decreases liability.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Amount_Promised"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The amount the customer promises to pay when the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into collection.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Promise to pay amount can only be entered if there is a collection date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment amount promised cannot be greater than the amount due.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Collection_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Collection_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reason the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into collection. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Collection Code can only be entered if there is a collection date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Followup_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice Adjustment should be followed up. This field is optional and populated by the user when being put into collection, dispute or on hold.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The invoice must either be in collection, dispute, or on hold to enter a followup date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Followup date cannot be in the past.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date the Customer Invoice Adjustment is put into dispute. If this field is populated when updating an existing invoice, the invoice adjustment will be put into dispute.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot be put into dispute if it decreases liability.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The amount the Customer Invoice Adjustment dispute is over. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A dispute amount can only be entered if there is a dispute date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Dispute amount cannot be greater than the amount due.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Dispute_Reason_Reference" type="wd:Dispute_ReasonObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The reason the Customer Invoice Adjustment was put into dispute. It is optional.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A dispute reason can only be entered if there is a dispute date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Control_Amount_Total"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the expected invoice total including tax. It is optional. An invoice cannot be submittted for approval if it has a non-zero control total that does not equal the sum of the extended amount for all invoice lines plus tax.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Terms_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TermsObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of the payment terms for the invoice. Payment Terms are the rules for establishing when a invoice payment is due and whether discounts are eligible to be taken or given for early payment. This is a required field, but if no payment terms are specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment terms if one is defined.
