Workday will automatically determine the due date and discount date based on the invoice date and payment terms.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A payment term with a discount is not allowed when the VAT on Payment option is turned on for the Company</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Terms is Required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Document Payment Status for Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Document_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Document Status for Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the payment type for the transaction and needs to be the reference id value of the payment type. Payment Type establishes methods of making payments, such as cash, check, or electronic transfer. Workday supplies the payment methods. Usually there is a one-to-one relationship between payment type (which you define) and Workday's provided payment methods. If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined. Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection would be initiated by Workday.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Type_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Reference ID of Customer Invoice Type which is used to help categorize invoices as well as determine the invoice layout that is used for the printed invoice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If not submitted, Workday will use the payee default the tax code.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Tax Code can't be set if you enabled Third Party Tax Service for this company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_PO_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This PO number will print on the delivered customer invoice. It is optional freeform text. This is not a Workday Purchase Order Reference ID.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="On_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>TRUE or FALSE If this is set to 'TRUE' the invoice will be put on hold.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Customer_Worktags" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Include Default Customer Worktags if this flag is TRUE</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Worktags_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize. Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>[list of worktag types] not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction header memo will print on the delivered transaction. It is optional freeform text</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Type_Override_Reference" type="wd:Currency_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice adjustment, this allows you to override the default Rate Type used to look up the currency conversion rate.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Date_Override" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice adjustment, this allows you to override the date used to look up the currency conversion rate. The default date is normally the same as the invoice date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Manual_Override_Reference"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For a foreign currency invoice adjustment, this allows you to directly override the currency conversion rate that will be used.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Calculation_Details" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Text field to summarize Tax Calculation Details.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Enable the Use Third Party Tax Service setting for the Company first to set the Tax Calculation Details.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Use Third Party Tax Service is not enabled for: [company].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Line_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Line_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice Line Data. A Customer Invoice may have multiple lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Data" type="wd:Taxable_Code_Application_NO_INPUT_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Tax Data by Tax Authority and Tax Code. For Customer Invoice Documents and Cash Sales tax data will always be calculated from the line data regardless of what is populated in Tax Rate Application Data. For Purchase Orders, Supplier Invoice Documents and Ad hoc Payments, if data is in Tax Rate Application Data, then that will be the tax information that is saved. Otherwise, the tax will be calculated from the lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Attachment_Data" type="wd:Financials_Attachment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Attachment Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Note_Data" type="wd:Note_WWS_DataType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Intercompany_Sub_Process" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Intercompany_Sub_ProcessType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Customer Invoice Adjustment reference for update and all Customer Invoice Adjustment data items</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Customer Invoice is canceled and cannot be resubmitted.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Customer Invoice is canceled and cannot be resubmitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Web Service is set to Add Only; documents cannot be resubmitted.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Web Service is set to Add Only; documents cannot be resubmitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Can only modify Customer Invoice Adjustments that have come from a Web Service or have been Manually Entered</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Can only modify Customer Invoice Adjustments that have come from a Web Service or have been Manually Entered</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Customer Invoice Adjustment is attached to a Supplier Invoice Adjustment and cannot be modified.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Customer Invoice Adjustment is attached to a Supplier Invoice Adjustment and cannot be modified.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't use web services to change documents with fields and line amounts reported in 1 or more tax declarations. Create an invoice adjustment if you want to add or change values reported in these tax declarations: [taxDeclaration].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment for update only purposes</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Business_Process_Parameters" type="wd:Financials_Business_Process_ParametersType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Business Process Parameters provide the ability to auto-submit to the business process.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Invoice Adjustment Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Submit Customer Invoice Adjustment Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Exceptions_Response_Data" type="wd:Application_Instance_Related_Exceptions_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exceptions Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Request</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice can't be canceled when one of its lines are tied to a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>A Customer Invoice cannot be cancelled when it is linked to a Supplier Invoice that is not cancelled or denied.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice cannot be cancelled when it is linked to a Supplier Invoice that is not cancelled or denied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't use web services to change documents with fields and line amounts reported in 1 or more tax declarations. Create an invoice adjustment if you want to add or change values reported in these tax declarations: [taxDeclaration].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_InvoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>This Invoice is not Cancelable.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_InvoiceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Adjustment Request</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Customer Invoice Adjustment can't be canceled when one of its lines are tied to a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer Invoice Adjustment cannot be cancelled when it has Supplier Invoice Adjustment that is not cancelled.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't use web services to change documents with fields and line amounts reported in 1 or more tax declarations. Create an invoice adjustment if you want to add or change values reported in these tax declarations: [taxDeclaration].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>This Invoice is not Cancelable.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Cancel_Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Customer Invoice Adjustment Response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_AdjustmentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Invoice Adjustment</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Exception_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exception (Errors and Warning) associated with the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Classification" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exception Classification (Error or Warning)</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Message" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Exception Detail</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Category_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing reference instances for a Customer Category</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Customer_Category_Reference" type="wd:Customer_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer name="Cash_Sale_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing all Cash Sale data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The total extended amount of all zero.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Please enter at least one invoice line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please enter at least one invoice line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Financial Account not valid for entry if not recording a deposit.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Financial Account not valid for entry if not recording a deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency is required if the Company specified does not have a default currency.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency is required, because the Company Reference: [company] does not have a default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Direct Debit and Credit Card are not valid payment types for a Cash Sale.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Direct Debit and Credit Card are not valid payment types for a Cash Sale.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer Reference is for a Customer, not for a Sponsor.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer Reference is for a Customer, not for a Sponsor.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Cash_Sale_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cash Sale ID. This is the Cash Sale unique identifier</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Cash Sale inside the Workday application. Cash Sale can only be updated from the web service</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Company which holds the asset</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the customer that the invoice is for. This is the reference id value of the customer</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If not submitted, Workday will use the payee default the tax code.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Cash_Sale_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Cash Sale Date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Type_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Reference ID of Customer Invoice Type which is used to help categorize invoices as well as determine the invoice layout that is used for the printed invoice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'From Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not greater than 'To Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Format is MM/DD/YYYY. If 'To Date' is entered, Workday will validate that it is not less than 'From Date'.
Please note that 'From date' and 'To Date' in the invoice header are not used to validate any dates on the invoice lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the payment type for the transaction and needs to be the reference id value of the payment type. Payment Type establishes methods of making payments, such as cash, check, or electronic transfer. Workday supplies the payment methods. Usually there is a one-to-one relationship between payment type (which you define) and Workday's provided payment methods. If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined. Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection would be initiated by Workday.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Check_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Check Number</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Record_Deposit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Boolean flag for Record Deposit</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Bank_Account_Reference" type="wd:Financial_AccountObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Bank Account</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Bank_Account_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Bank Account is not valid for Company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Bank Account is not valid for Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Bank Account Reference is required if Record Deposit is true.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Bank Account Reference is required if Record Deposit is true.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deposit_Reference_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Free form text field for a Cash Sale Reference Number.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Type_Reference" type="wd:Currency_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Currency Rate Type</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Rate Type cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Rate Type cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rate Data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Rate cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Rate cannot be entered in a non-foreign currency transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction header memo will print on the delivered transaction. It is optional freeform text</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Control_Total_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the expected invoice total including tax. It is optional. An invoice cannot be submittted for approval if it has a non-zero control total that does not equal the sum of the extended amount for all invoice lines plus tax.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The sum of invoice lines does not match the control total amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Cash_Sale_Line_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_Line_WWS_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Attachment_Data" type="wd:Financials_Attachment_DataType"/><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Data" type="wd:Taxable_Code_Application_NO_INPUT_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Tax Data by Tax Authority and Tax Code. For Customer Invoice Documents and Cash Sales tax data will always be calculated from the line data regardless of what is populated in Tax Rate Application Data. For Purchase Orders, Supplier Invoice Documents and Ad hoc Payments, if data is in Tax Rate Application Data, then that will be the tax information that is saved. Otherwise, the tax will be calculated from the lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Cash_Sale_Intercompany_Sub_Process" type="wd:Cash_Sale_Intercompany_Sub_ProcessType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Cash_Sale_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Cash Sale If field is left blank, it will default to the same company as the contract header.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Set up an intercompany relationship between [hdr company] and [line company] using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and the line company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Company cannot be modified on this Contract line</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Company cannot be modified on this Contract line</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Conversion Rates between currency and company's default currency are not defined.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Company on the line must be the same as Company on the document for intercompany customers.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Sales_Item_Reference" type="wd:Item_DescriptorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the sales item. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Sales_Item_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Sales Item is not enterable for this Customer Contract Amendment</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Sales Item is not enterable for this Customer Contract Amendment</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The sales item is not mapped to a purchase item.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The sales item is not mapped to a purchase item.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Category_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the spend category. A spend category is a classification of items and services that drive the accounting. All expense items are associated with a Spend Category and sales items are associated with a Revenue Category. If a value is provided for sales item, revenue category will default so it is recommended to provide a value for either sales item or revenue category but not both. It is required if sales item is blank.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Revenue_Category_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Revenue Category is not enterable for Customer Contract Amendment</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category is not enterable for Customer Contract Amendment</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The revenue category is not mapped to a spend category.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The revenue category is not mapped to a spend category.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Contract_Line_Type_Reference" type="wd:Contract_Line_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line Type for Customer Contract Line.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Line Type must be Fixed Amount - Revenue Only if the Contract Type is designated as a linked contract on the Maintain Customer Contract Types task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Billable_Project_Reference" type="wd:Project_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billable Project Reference for Contract Line. Billable Project is required for project contract line types.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Project_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Invoices before you amend the Billable Project on Contract Line.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cancel Invoices before you amend the Billable Project on Contract Line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cancel Schedules on the contract line before you amend the Billable Project.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cancel Schedules on the contract line before you amend the Billable Project.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Project_Transaction_Source_Reference" type="wd:Project_Transaction_SourceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Project Transaction Source Reference. before you amend the Project Transaction Source.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cancel Schedules on the contract line before you amend the Project Transaction value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Frequency_Behavior_Reference" value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Exclude_From_Calculation" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This option may be set in order to exclude the contract line from the Revenue allocation calculation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Range_Low"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Range Low is the lower range value calculated for the Revenue Allocation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Range_High"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Range High is the Higher range value calculated for the Revenue Allocation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="MidRange"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Mid Range is the median value calculated for the Revenue Allocation</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Relative_Selling_Price_Allocation"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Relative Selling Price Allocation calculated based on Range Low,Range High and Mid Range values</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Renewable" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Renewable</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="New_Business" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line New Business</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Deferred Revenue</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Deferred Revenue Flag is not enterable for this Customer Contract Amendment</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Deferred Revenue Flag is not enterable for this Customer Contract type="wd:Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_TemplateObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to a Revenue Recognition Schedule Template. This allows you to automatically generate Revenue Recognition Installments upon approval of the contract.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule Template can only be selected if Deferred Revenue is selected.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Contract_Line_Revenue_Override_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Entered Revenue value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Default_Worktags_Reference" type="wd:Audited_Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Default Worktags not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category worktag is not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>list of worktag types not valid for this transaction : [types]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Category worktag is not valid for this transaction.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a balancing worktag for Worktags of the following type: [type]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The balancing worktag for the contract line cannot be changed because there are in process or processed billing or processed billing or revenue recognition installments for the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Required worktag type(s) are missing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description_Override" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Item Description Override</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Invoice_Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Memo for the Invoice line. This is free form text.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Invoice_Memo_Override" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Invoice Memo Override</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Customer_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The ship to customer for the contract line. This field will default from header if left blank.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The ship to customer must be a part of the Customer's connection map.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer that is part of the Customer's Connection Map.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Reference" type="wd:Address_ReferenceObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The ship to address reference for the contract line. If there is a ship to customer on the line and this field is left blank, it will default to the ship to connection's default address.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Ship-To Customer first before entering a Ship-To Address Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Ship-To Address you entered is not valid for this Ship-To Customer. If you did not enter a Ship-To Customer, Workday chose the default for this Sold-To Customer for you, and this Ship-To Address is not valid for that customer.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Ship_To_Address_Data" type="wd:Address_Information_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The exact address specified in the address reference stored on the contract.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Applicability_Reference" type="wd:Tax_ApplicabilityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax applicability. If this is blank and there invoice line has a sales item, Workday will default tax applicability from the sales item. If the invoice line has a tax code then tax applicability is required.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the tax code. If this is blank, Workday will default in the default tax code from the invoice header if there is one. If the invoice line has a tax applicability value, Workday will validate that the invoice line also has a tax code.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billing Schedule Template From Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billing Schedule Template To Date.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Billing_Notes" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Billing Notes</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Recognition_Line_Notes" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Revenue Recognition Line Notes</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Document_Status_Reference" type="wd:Document_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Contract Line Status Override</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't cancel the Contract Line until invoices or revenue recognition finishes processing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't cancel the line because this customer contract has recognized deferred revenue.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Billed To Date Amount of zero to cancel the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter an Amendment Date that is on or after the To Date of the award line to set the line status to complete.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Contract Line Amount of zero to cancel the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Line Override Status is not enterable for Customer Contract.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't complete this contract line because the contract line amount is not equal to the billed to date amount</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't terminate this contract line because it has a deferred revenue balance without a revenue override amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't terminate this contract line because the contract line amount is not equal to the billed to date amount</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't complete this contract line because it has a deferred revenue balance without a revenue override amount.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Verify that you want to terminate or complete deferred revenue balances on 1 or more contract lines with a revenue override amount because your deferred revenue could become out of balance.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Local_Person_Name_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the components of a name in local script, such as the First Name and Last Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains first name in local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Middle_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains middle name in local script for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains last name in local script, which is generally configured to as Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Secondary_Last_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains secondary last name in local script, which is generally configured to as Maternal Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="First_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains first name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Middle_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains middle name in second local script for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Last_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains last name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Given Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Secondary_Last_Name_2" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains secondary last name in second local script, which is generally configured to as Maternal Family Name, for supporting countries.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Local_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the formatted local name in local script as configured for the country.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute name="Local_Script" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the formatted local script name which contains the ISO code and name.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Customer_Payment_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element for the Put Customer Payment Request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_PaymentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Payment.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Request References element contains the specific instance set that should be returned in the Get operation. Either a Reference ID or the Workday ID (GUID) should be specified for each instance to be returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Customer_Payment_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Payment_for_InvoicesObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Request References</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Request Criteria element.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Company_Reference" type="wd:OrganizationObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Company which holds the asset</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Remit-from_Customer_Reference" type="wd:PayeeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This it the customer the paymetn is for. name="Payment_Date_On_or_After" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Date on Date or After</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Date_On_or_Before" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Date on Date or Before</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Created_by_Worker_Reference" type="wd:WorkerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a Worker who created the transaction.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Tranaction_is_Intercompany" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Transaction Is Intercompany</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Response Group allows the request to specify which data attributes should be returned in the Response, such as whether to include reference elements, attachments, etc.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Include Reference</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Customer_Payments_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element for the Get Customer Payments name="Customer_PaymentType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes Customer Payment for Invoices instance and an existing Customer Payment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Response Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment" type="wd:Customer_PaymentType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment instance and the Response on the Get operation. Contains the instances returned by the Get operation and their accompanying data.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Customer Payment Request Reference Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Customer Paynent Request Criteria Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Respones Filter Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the echoed Customer Payment Response Group Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Results" type="wd:Response_ResultsType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Customer Payment Response Results element, including total results and paging</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Customer Payment Response Data element.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Remittance Advice is used in Workday's Auto-Application logic to determine which Customer Invoices a Customer Payment should be applied to, and how they should be applied. Included in Remittance Advice can be specific Customer Invoice(s) references, an Amount to Pay, the Bill-to Customer reference, and Customer Payment Remittance Advice Details which include Customer Name, Customer ID, PO Number, Invoice Number and Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Invoice_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Invoice_DocumentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a Customer Invoice that should be paid by the Customer Payment this Remittance Advice is for.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Invoice_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Amount_to_Pay"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Suggested amount to pay in this remittance advice.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Bill-to_Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Suggested Bill-to Customer to pay, which will help determine which invoice(s) should be paid.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Details_Replacement_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Details_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice Details are any of the following chosen, along with free-form text for each: Customer Name, Customer ID, PO Number, Invoice Number and Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Details_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice Details are any of the following chosen, along with free-form text for each: Customer Name, Customer ID, PO Number, Invoice Number and Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Remittance_Advice_Type_Reference" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice Type Reference is a metadata reference to either: Customer Name, Customer ID, Invoice Number, PO Number or Other.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Detail_Information" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Remittance Advice Detail Information is free form text that describes the Remittance Advice Type it is paired with.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Data Element for Put and Get Customer Payment for Invoices.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Payment Amount must be greater than 0.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Amount must be greater than 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Ready to Auto-Apply cannot be true unless a Remit-From Customer is provided, and the Payment Type selected is not a Credit Card or Direct Debit type.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Ready to Auto-Apply cannot be true unless a Remit-From Customer is provided, and the Payment Type selected is not a Credit Card or Direct Debit type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The customer selected does not have credit card information setup, selecting a payment type with a payment method of Credit Card where no credit card information is setup will not perform integrations with any payment provider.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The customer selected does not have credit card information setup, selecting a payment type with a payment method of Credit Card where no credit card information is setup will not perform integrations with any payment provider.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Direct Debit can only be utilized if Customer has a Settlement Bank Account configured.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Direct Debit can only be utilized if Customer has a Settlement Bank Account configured.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Payment Type must be valid for Bank Account entered.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Type must be valid for Bank Account entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Payment Date cannot be greater than the Deposit Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Payment Date cannot be greater than the Deposit Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot deposit payment into a Customer Deposit that isn't part of Payment Company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot deposit payment into a Customer Deposit that isn't part of Payment Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment Currency is not accepted by Customer Deposit's Financial Account.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Customer Payment Currency is not accepted by Customer Deposit's Financial Account.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Remit from Customer is required when Locked-in-Workday is enabled.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Customer Payment for Invoices ID. This is the Customer Payment unique identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Customer Payment inside the Workday Application. Customer Payment can only be updated from the web service is this is set.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Company which holds the asset</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Company for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the payment If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the customer has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for customer then payment will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Currency for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Payment_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Transaction date of the Customer Payment.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Payment Date for this payment because it is already included in a deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the payment type for the transaction and needs to be the reference id value of the payment type. Payment Type establishes methods of making payments, such as cash, check, or electronic transfer. Workday supplies the payment methods. Usually there is a one-to-one relationship between payment type (which you define) and Workday's provided payment methods. If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined. Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection would be initiated by Workday.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Status" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Status.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Payment_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Total Payment Amount for the Customer Payment</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Payment Amount for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Payment Amount for this payment because it is already included in a deposit or has been applied.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Remit-from_Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Remit-from Customer that is funding this payment .</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Check_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Check Number</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This transaction header memo will print on the delivered transaction. It is optional freeform text</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Ready_to_Auto-Apply" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Ready to Auto-Apply makes this Customer Payment available to the Auto-Application process if it is run prior to this payment being applied manually. Remit-from Customer is required if Ready to Auto-Apply is checked.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Electronic_File_Information" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Electronic File Information is free form text that may be entered to identify the Electronic File that initiated this web service integration.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Deposit_Reference" type="wd:Customer_DepositObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The optional reference identification for an existing Workday Customer Deposit that matches Payment Company and Currency, and is still in draft and able to accept more customer payments.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Payments using payment methods of Credit Card, Direct Debit, or Direct Deposit cannot be included in a Customer Deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change the Customer Deposit for this payment because it is already included in another In Progress or Approved deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>If a Customer Deposit is referenced, it must be in Draft Status.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>If a Customer Deposit is referenced, it must be in Draft Status.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Do_Not_Apply_Payment_to_Invoices_on_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If set to True, Do Not Apply Payment to Invoices on Hold indicates whether this payment should be used to apply to Customer Invoices that are On Hold from Payment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Show_Only_Matched_Invoices_when_Applying" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>If true, the customer payment will show only customer invoice documents that match the remittance criteria during application of payment.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_Data" type="wd:Customer_Payment_Remittance_Advice_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Remittance Advice for this Customer Payment, utilized in Workday's Auto-Application logic in determining which Customer Invoices to apply this payment to.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Deposit_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Request References element contains the specific instance set that should be returned in the Get operation. Either a Reference ID or the Workday ID (GUID) should be specified for each instance to be returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Customer_Deposit_Reference" type="wd:Customer_DepositObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Customer Deposit.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Customer_Deposit_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element is the wrapper around a list of elements representing the Customer Request specific criteria needed to search for instances. This is the reference id value of the customer</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Hierarchy_Reference" type="wd:CustomerObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing customer that has child customers</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Status_Reference" type="wd:Business_Entity_Status_ValueObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing instance of Business type="wd:Financial_AccountObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Bank Account that the Customer Deposit will be name="Payment_Deposit_Date_On_or_Before" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Deposit Date On or After must be earlier than Payment Deposit Date On or Before.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deposit_Reference_Number" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Free form text name="Customer_Deposit_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Customer Deposit reference for update and all Customer Deposit data items.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Payment Deposit Date must be greater than the Payment Date for all Payments Account.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Transaction Currency not accepted by selected Bank Account.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Bank Account is either not valid for Company or Currency, or is not enabled for Customer Payments.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Bank Account is either not valid for Company or Currency, or is not enabled for Customer Payments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Please select at least one payment to deposit.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please select Deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ID" This is the Customer Deposit unique identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing and canceling the Customer Payment inside the Workday Application. This is the reference id value of the company.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Payment_Deposit_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the Customer Deposit date. Enter this amount to ensure it matches the sum of the payment amounts deposited.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Type_Reference" type="wd:Currency_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Currency Rate Type</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Currency_Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Currency Conversion Rate Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="21"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Electronic_File_Information" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Electronic File Information is free form text that may be entered to identify the Electronic File that initiated this web service integration.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference" type="wd:Customer_PaymentObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to 1 to many Customer Payments existing in Workday, to include in this deposit.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Payment_for_Invoices_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Credit Card, Direct Debit, and Direct Deposit payments cannot be included when submitting Customer Deposits.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more of the Customer Payments selected to deposit is already canceled. Only non-canceled payments can be deposited.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Company for all Customer Payments specified must match the Company of the Customer Deposit.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more of the Cash Sales selected to deposit is in progress. This value is read-only and will be ignored on the submit web service.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Customer_Deposit_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Customer Deposit reference for update and all Customer Deposit data name="Note_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Includes Notes that have been made for a business object. On a Get operation, all existing Notes will be populated. On a Put or Submit operation, any note information on the request will be added as new notes. Existing notes cannot be updated on a Put or Submit request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Created" type="xsd:dateTime"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The date and time this Note was created. If this element is not included then ALL of the Response Groups are included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Award Reference is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Award_Contract_data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Award Reference data is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Attachment_data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if Award Attachment Data should be included in the response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Awards_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element is the top-level request element for all Award "Get" operations.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Award reference element used to return the Award by unique identifier</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_CriteriaType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the wrapper element for the list of criteria representing the Award specific criteria needed to search for name="Response_Group" type="wd:Award_Contract_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element content containing Award Response Group element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Award_ContractType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes all data for a single Award Contract.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Reference" type="wd:Award_ContractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to a single Award for which data is being returned.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Data" type="wd:Award_Contract_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Award_Contract_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element containing Award Response Data for requested references or criteria and for requested response group</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Award" type="wd:Award_ContractType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Element</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Get_Awards_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Award response elements including echoed request data and request result data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_References" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_ReferencesType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_Criteria" type="wd:Award_Contract_Request_CriteriaType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Group" type="wd:Award_Contract_Response_GroupType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Results" type="wd:Response_ResultsType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Data" type="wd:Award_Contract_Response_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Award Response Data element.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Award_Contract_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains all of the data to describe an Award Contract in Sponsor.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Authorized Amount must be equal to the sum of the Contract Line Extended Amounts.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Schedule specified is already associated with another Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award required.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Schedule is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Flow Through Sponsor is required if Sub Award is true.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Flow Through Sponsor is required if Sub Award is true.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>At least one and only one award line must be marked as Primary.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>At least one and only one award line must be marked as Primary.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One or more Grants specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Grant can only be defined on active.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Purpose Code must be active.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Purpose Code must be active.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Payment Type associated with the Letter of Credit Reference must match the Payment Type Reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Payment Type Reference must be specified if including a Letter of Credit
