Reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Letter of Credit Document ID can not be specified without a Letter of Credit Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One or more Exception References specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Facilities and Award; a Facilities and Administration Exception can only be associated with one Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If specified, Letter of Credit's default currency must match Company's default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Entered differs from Company default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Authorized Amount cannot exceed the Sponsor change in Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Lines cannot be removed on Correct Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Lines cannot be removed on Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot submit Original Award Proposal on Submit Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Award_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Reference ID. This is the Award Unique Identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. Sponsor Award Types are tenanted data that can be used for categorizing Awards.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Purpose_Code_Reference" type="wd:Award_Purpose_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Purpose Code for the Award. type="wd:Payment_TermsObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Terms Reference for Customer Contract</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Institutional_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Institutional ID</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Related_Award_Reference" type="wd:Award_ContractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>For information purposes only, an Award "related" to the current one worktag of each type is allowed</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one worktag of each type is allowed</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Worktags provided are not valid for this transaction</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Remove these worktag types that aren't valid for this transaction: [list of worktag types].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Lifecycle_Status_Reference" type="wd:Award_Lifecycle_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Lifecycle Status for Award</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The award header lifecycle status is invalid.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The award header lifecycle status is invalid.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Sub_Award" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not this Award is a sub-contracted award. If set to TRUE, a Flow Through Sponsor must also be specified.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Flow_Through_Sponsor_Reference" type="wd:SponsorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The sponsor who is the ultimate funding source for the Award. This field is only required for sub-awards.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Sponsor_Reference" type="wd:SponsorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Sponsor with whom the Award is Contracted.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, if there is non-canceled Award Costing for any of the Grants on the Award, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, if there is non-canceled Award Costing for any of the Grants on the Award, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Bill_To_Sponsor_Reference" type="wd:SponsorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Sponsor who should be billed for transactions against this award.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Bill-To-Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, or if there are approved or in-progress Customer Invoices for the award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Bill-To-Sponsor cannot be changed in Correct Award if the award has one or more Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, or if there are approved or in-progress Customer Invoices for the award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Payment_Type_Reference" type="wd:Payment_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Payment Type Reference for Customer Contract</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Letter_Of_Credit_Reference" type="wd:Letter_Of_CreditObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Letter of Credit which will be drawn from to pay for Cost Reimbursable expenditures against this award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Letter_of_Credit_Document_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Document ID used to reference this award for Letter of Credit collection. This field is required if Letter of Credit is entered.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. If the company base currency is not allowed currency for payer/payee then transaction will not be able to be submitted for approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Entered differs from Company default currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Sponsor_Direct_Cost_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The direct cost that will be billed to the sponsor for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Sponsor_Facilities_and_Administration_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The indirect costs that will be billed to the sponsor for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Cost_Share_Total_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The obligated cost share amount for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Authorized_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The maximum amount authorized for billing and collection for transactions against this award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Limit_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Billing Limit Override for the Award. If this value is non-zero, Cost Reimbursable billing for this award will not exceed this value. Otherwise, the Authorized Amount will be used as the Billing Limit.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Cost_Share_Required_by_Sponsor" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the Sponsor requires Cost Share for the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Anticipated_Sponsor_Direct_Cost_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The total anticipated Sponsor Direct Cost for the life of the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Anticipated_Facilities_and_Administration_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The total anticipated Sponsor indirect cost for the life of the award.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Award_Schedule_Reference" type="wd:Award_ScheduleObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Schedule. This schedule will also be used in an Award Budget for the award if one is made.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CFDA_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Description of CFDA program</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="NSF_Code_Reference" type="wd:NSF_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>NSF Code</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Proposal_Version" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Proposal Version</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" type="wd:Award_Attachment_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Submit_Award_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Award reference for update Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot use inactive Revenue Category</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot use inactive Revenue cannot change in Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktags are required but have not been assigned: [missing].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktag types are invalid: [invalid].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You cannot include the Line Status on the Submit Award web service. Please remove the Line Status reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference" type="wd:Receivable_Contract_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Receivable Contract Line for update only purposes.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Receivable Contract Line Reference ID. You can either update an existing award line on this award or create a new award line for this award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Number"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line Number</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Number cannot change in Correct Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Number cannot change in Correct Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="4"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Intercompany_Affiliate_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id for the award line company. The line company must be part of the header company's intercompany profile.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Line company with different currency from header company not allowed for award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Line company [line company] with currency [line company currency] not allowed for award with header company [hdr company] with currency [hdr company currency]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Set up an intercompany relationship between header and line company using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Set up an intercompany relationship between [hdr company] and [line company] using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Company and award header company must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Company [line company] and award header company [header company] must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Revenue_Category_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the revenue category. A revenue category is a classification of services that drive the accounting, and indicates the types of services this Award line is intended to represent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Revenue Category cannot be changed in Correct Award if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award Category cannot be changed in Correct Award if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award costing for the grant on the line, or there are invoices created for the line, or the award cost processing job is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Lifecycle_Status_Reference" type="wd:Award_Lifecycle_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Lifecycle Status for Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status, [line lifecycle status], combination with award lifecycle status [header lifecycle status], is not permitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Line_Type_Reference" type="wd:Contract_Line_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Line Type for the Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Type cannot be changed in Correct Award if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Type cannot be changed in Correct Award if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost Reimbursable line has an approved Billing Schedule, or there is non-canceled Award Costing for the Grants on the line, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description_Override" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A description of the Award Line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean Flag indicating whether or not the revenue for the award line is deferred. Cannot be used for cost-reimbursable billing.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Line_Status_Reference" type="wd:Document_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line Status for Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Enter a Contract Line Amount of zero to cancel the contract line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't cancel the Contract Line until invoices or revenue recognition finishes processing.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Grant" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award contract line is the primary line for the award</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Grant_Reference" type="wd:GrantObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Grant for the Award Line. line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Award_Line_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Valid lines can be seen in the UI for the Schedule using the Maintain Contract Lines button.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please add only valid contract lines to the schedule based on the Company, Customer and Contract Line Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot add or update an installment if the schedule Method is not Custom.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please set the Method to Custom if you are adding or updating installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot add or update installments and also request to Generate Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If Billing method is Custom, one and only one option may be chosen for: Use From Date, Use To Date, Use Number of Days before Start Date. If Billing Method is not Custom, one and only one option must be chosen for: Use From Date, Use To Date, Use Number of Days before Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If Invoice Uses To Date is entered, To Date must be entered.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A From Date must be entered when the Invoice Date Option is Use From Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>When billing method is not Custom, then From Date and either Number of Installments or To Date are required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Start Date must be before End Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Billing Frequency is required unless Billing Method is Custom.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Start Date can't be changed with completed installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Number of Installments can't be less than the number of Installments already completed or in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Frequency Behavior can't be changed with already completed Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>End Date can't be before the date of completed installments or installments in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>There must be at least 1 installment to submit the Billing Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The line's currency does not match schedule's currency.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract lines must contain the same billable project that is identified on the Billing Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Lines must not contain more than one Billing Types for a Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_Reference_ID" type="wd:Receivable_Contract_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing instances Contract Lines linked to this schedule.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Installment_Data" type="wd:Billing_Installment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Billing Installment Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Schedule_Installment_Schedule_Data" type="wd:Customer_Contract_Schedule_Installment_Schedule_DataType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Billing_Installment_Line_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Billing Schedule Installment Line data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Installment lines must refer to a contract line which is already linked to the line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Order" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line order</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Overrride_Line" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override Line flag. Use this to specify values on the installment line instead of using values derived from either the installment, the schedule, or the contract line. This must be on to specify overrides.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot provide invoice line overrides unless Installment Override is ON.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Contract_Line_Reference" type="wd:Installment_ItemObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of a contract line linked to this installment line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line Item description</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Quantity"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Quantity. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="22"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Unit_of_Measure_Reference" type="wd:Unit_of_MeasureObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unit of measure. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Quantity_2"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Quantity 2. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="22"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Unit_of_Measure_2_Reference" type="wd:Unit_of_MeasureObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unit of Measure 2. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Unit_Cost"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Unit Price. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Amount. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>From Date. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Applicability_Reference" type="wd:Tax_ApplicabilityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Tax Applicability.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Tax_Code_Reference" type="wd:Tax_CodeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Tax Code.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Deferred Revenue flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Memo" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Memo. If you supply this value as an override, you must also enable the Override Line flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Billing_Installment_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Billing Schedule Installment Data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>You may not update installments with status Canceled, Completed, or In Progress.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot update an installment if its status is Canceled, Completed, or In Progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Billing Installment Line Data is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Installment_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Billing Installment Reference ID. Due Date is read-only and the system derives it based on Payment Terms.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment From date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment To date</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="On_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment On Hold flag</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Total_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Installment Amount</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Milestone_Reference" type="wd:Milestone_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing a unique instance of Milestone</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Date_Milestone_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Override_Invoice_Header" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Override Invoice Header flag. name="Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Revenue Recognition Schedule data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot add or update installments and also request to Generate Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contract Lines may be added to the schedule, but cannot be removed.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please include all existing contract lines when adding a contract line to the schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line(s) being added are not valid for Schedule. Valid lines can be seen in the UI for the Schedule using the Maintain Contract Lines button.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please add only valid contract lines to the schedule based on the Company, Customer and Contract Line Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot add or update an installment if the schedule Method is not Custom.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Please set the Method to Custom if you are adding or updating installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Ledger periods are required for all installments within the selected schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Start Date can't be changed with completed installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Start Date must be before End Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Frequency Behavior can't be changed with already completed Installments.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Schedule Number of Installments can't be less than the number of Installments already completed or in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>End Date can't be before the date of completed installments or installments in progress.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The invoice date of all invoice first lines must be within the schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The invoice date of all invoice first lines must be within the schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoices can't have lines that belong to more than one Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoice can't be submitted until its lines' Documents are Approved.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>All Customer Invoice Lines added to Revenue Recognition Schedules need to have their Deferred Revenue flag checked.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is controlled by Contracts yet has lines not pertaining to Contracts.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is controlled by Awards yet has lines not pertaining to Awards.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is controlled by Customer Invoices yet has lines not pertaining to Customer Invoices.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Revenue Recognition Schedule controlled by Customer Invoice can only have Lines pertaining to a single Customer Invoice.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoices need to have all of their Customer Invoices Lines being non-intercompany.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedules controlled by Customer Invoices need have their lines' Company match the Revenue Recognition Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A Revenue Recognition Schedule's controlling transaction cannot be changed once set.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Must enter a Revenue Recognition Controlling Transaction or at least one Line when submitting a Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Recognition Schedule is already pertaining to a certain Customer Invoice Document. Create a new one to associate it to the referred Customer Invoice Line.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>There must be at least 1 installment to submit the Revenue Recognition Schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_Reference_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Revenue Recognition Schedule Reference ID. This is the unique Revenue Recognition Schedule identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Submit" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Submit flag. The service will attempt to submit the schedule if this is on.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Generate_Installments" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Generate Installments flag. The service will generate revenue recognition installments if this is set to true. You cannot generate installments if using a Custom schedule distribution method.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You cannot generate installments if using a Custom schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can't generate installments for Transaction type schedules.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>You can’t generate installments for Percent Complete schedules.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_Status_Reference" type="wd:Document_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule status.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" Type</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule currency.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Currency_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Company_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule company.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Company_Reference_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If any line is linked to the schedule, the company may not be changed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Intercompany_Header_Company_Reference" Schedule's Company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Customer_Reference" type="wd:Billable_EntityObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the the customer may not be changed.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_Type_Reference" type="wd:Schedule_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the Schedule Type.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_On_Hold" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Schedule On Hold flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Schedule_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Schedule Description.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Milestone_Reference" type="wd:Milestone_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing milestones linked to this schedule. Schedule processing is contingent upon these milestones being met.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Customer_Date_Milestone_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>At Least One Milestone has an Invalid Customer or Sponsor</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Amount_Distribution_Method_Reference" type="wd:Schedule_Distribution_MethodObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the Amount Distribution method for Revenue Recognition.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Frequency_Reference" type="wd:Frequency_BehaviorObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference element representing the schedule Revenue Recognition Frequency.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="From_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>From date. The system generates installments based on this value.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The end dates of all customer contract lines must be between the Schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The end dates of all customer contract lines must be between the Schedule date range.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="To_Date" type="xsd:date"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>To date. The system generates installments based on this value.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Number_of_Installments"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Number of installments. type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Request_ReferencesType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element content contains the Facilities and Administration Exception reference element used to name="Facilities_and_Admin_ExceptionType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper Element that includes all data for a single Facilities and Administration ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Facilities and Administration Exception (Exception: [exception])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot delete the Facilities and Administration exception detail reference because the exception is referenced on an approved Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Facilities and Admin Exception Type entered must be valid for use on F&A Exceptions.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception should provide an Override F&A Rate, then the Override F&A Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception should provide a Waive Rate, then the Waive Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception is configured to waive Facilities and Admin costs, it must have an associated Waived Expense Allocation Profile.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the unique identifier for F&A Exception.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Locked_in_Workday" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Set to True to disable editing the F&A Exception inside the Workday application.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Exception_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the F&A Exception.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Basis_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Basis_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing F&A Basis Type. Basis Type identifies the valid set of Object Classes to be used for this F&A Exception.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The primary type for the F&A Exception. If an exception type indicating an Facilities and Administration rate override is selected, every transaction against the award will use the primary rate on the exception for Facilities and Administration calculations, unless a Facilities and Administration Exception Detail for the Object Class for the Transaction specifies another rate to use. If an exception type indicating an Facilities and Administration waive rate is selected, every transaction against the award will use the primary waive rate on the exception for Facilities and Administration calculations, unless a Facilities and Administration Exception Detail for the Object Class for the Transaction specifies another waive rate to use.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Waive_Rate"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile which allocates costs for Facilities and Administration Excptions that waive any portion Facilities and Administration costs.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Exception_Detail_Data" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element containing exception rates by object class.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Detail_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element containing F&A Exception rates based on object class.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Facilities and Administration Exception Detail Data cannot be changed because it is referenced by an approved or amended Award. (Exception: [exception]; Object Class: [object])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Object Class has already been specified for this exception. Object class must be unique per exception. (Object class: [object])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Object Class specified is not valid for the Basis Type. Only object classes defined for the Basis Type are allowed. (Object Class: [object])</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Facilities and Admin Exception Type entered must be valid for use on Facilities and Admin Exception Details.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail should provide an Override Rate, then the Override Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>If the Facilities and Administration Exception Type Entered does not indicate that the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail should provide a Waive Rate, then the Waive Rate entered must be 0.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_Detail_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_DetailObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This reference for the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail for update. If no reference specified, a new reference will be created.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Object_Class_Reference" type="wd:Object_ClassObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Object Class. Only Object Classes defined on the Basis Type referenced in the Facilities and Admin Exception Data are valid.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Facilities and Administration Exception Type for the Exception Detail. The rate at which Facilities and Administration is calculated and/or waived can be overridden at the Object Class level. If an exception type that overrides the Facilities and Administration rate is chosen, transactions against and award line that have the object class for the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail will use the rate specified on the exception detail for Facilities and Administration calculations. If an exception type that waives Facilities and Administration is chosen, transactions against and award line that have the object class for the Facilities and Administration Exception Detail will use the rate specified on the exception detail calculating waived Facilities and Administration.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Rate_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate for the Object Class reference as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Waive_Rate"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Rate for the Object Class reference as percent entered in decimal format, ex: enter 1 for 100%, .5 for 50%, etc.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="7"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="4"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Facilities and Admin Exception reference for update and Exception Detail data</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Facilities and Administration Exception already exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Exception Name with the Basis Type is already in use. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Exception_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains the response data for the Put Facilities and Administration Exception request</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Admin_Exception_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_ExceptionObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to the Facilities and Administration Exception that was created or updated by the Put request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sponsor_Response_GroupType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Wrapper element around a list of elements representing the amount of data that should be included in the Sponsor response.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Reference" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Sponsor reference is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Include_Sponsor_Data" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Flag indicating if the Sponsor data is to be included in the response</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Sponsor_WWS_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This Element contains Sponsor relationships and attributes</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The default payment type selected requires a Settlement Bank Account. Please enter the appropriate Settlement Bank Account information.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Sponsor Name must match Business Entity Name.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Only one active Settlement Bank Account allowed for the given entity.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>A specific alternate name usage can only be used once per business entity</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Two Reference ID's have been provided that resolve to different instances. Please provide only one Reference ID or verify that both Reference ID's resolve to the same instance.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Business Entity Data is required.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Business Entity to create from is only applicable when creating a Customer, not updating an existing Customer</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more of the Sponsor Children provided belong to another Sponsor Hierarchy. element for the list of criteria representing the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile specific criteria needed to search for instances.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:choice><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Response_Filter" type="wd:Response_FilterType"/><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains all the data necessary to describe a Facilities and Administration has the same name.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Total Percent must equal 100.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_ID" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile ID. A unique reference for the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" type="wd:Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Distribution_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Distribution name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element Containing data for adding or updating a Facilities and Administration for update only purposes.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_Data" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:attribute><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_ResponseType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains the response information for a Put Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile Request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Allocation_Profile_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Waived_Expense_Allocation_ProfileObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A reference to the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile that was created or updated for the request.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute ref="wd:version"/></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Worktag_Offset_Override_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains Worktag Override information for a single worktag offset for a single allocation distribution for a Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile Data. If an Expense against an award line has waived F&A, and it is tagged with a worktag with a worktag type that is overridden in this distribution, then the accounting that is generated for the non-sponsored portion of the expense for this distribution will replace the original worktag with the worktag defined in this override.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Accounting_Worktag_Type_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_Worktag_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Accounting Worktag Type for the Worktag Offset Override. If the source transaction against the award line contains a worktag of this type, The non-sponsored cost generatd for this distribution will replace the original worktag with the offsetting worktag.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Type that isn't already in use.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Accounting Worktag Type: [wtt] is invalid for use on Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Distribution</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Worktag_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_WorktagObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The worktag that will be used as an override for the non-sponsored cost accounting generated for this distribution.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Balancing Worktag Type: [balancingWT] must not be left blank.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Select a Worktag Override for Worktag Type: Fund that doesn't have a fund type funded by a sponsor.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The Accounting Worktag:[worktag] must be for the Accounting Worktag Type:[accounting worktag type].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Distribution_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This element contains data describing a single distribution in the Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Allocation Profile</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Each Expense Distribution must include a Worktag Override for the Worktag Type: Fund</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" name="Allocation_Distribution_Percent"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Allocation Distribution percent for this distribution. This percentage of the non-sponsor expense will be allocated to the worktags defined in this distribution.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expnese_Worktag_Offest_Override_Data" type="wd:Facilities_and_Administration_Waived_Expense_Worktag_Offset_Override_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Facilities and Administration Waived Expense Worktag Offset Override Data</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Basis_Limit_Edit_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contains information for the Facilities and Administration Basis Limit for the Award Line, and is frequently used restricting Facilities and Administration calculations on sub-contracted Award Lines. A Basis Limit can restrict Facilities and Administration calculations for one or more award lines. A Basis Limit cannot be used across multiple awards. To enter a Basis Limit that applies to more than one award line, enter the same Basis Limit Name and Basis Limit Amount on the Basis Limit Data element of each award line in the request. Each unique combination of Basis Limit Name and Basis Limit Amount will result in the creation of a single basis limit object.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Basis Limit Name must be filled. Basis Limit Amount cannot be zero.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Basis_Limit_Name" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The name of the Basis Limit for the award line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Basis_Limit_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The maximum cost basis that is eligible for Facilities and Administration calculations for the Award Line or group of Award Lines.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="14"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType Billing or Revenue Recognition Schedules, or if there are approved or in-progress Customer Invoices for the This field is required if Letter of Credit is entered.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Currency_Reference" type="wd:CurrencyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id of currency of the transaction If no currency is specified, Workday will first look to see if the payer/payee has a preferred currency and if not, currency will be populated with the company base currency. approval.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Currency Entered differs from Company default currency.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Currency Entered differs value="6"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Billing_Limit_Override"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Billing Limit Override for the name="Award_Contract_Amendment_Line_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award amendment data including award contract and award contract line data being amended.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Contract Line Amount not required for Contract Line Type Types</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Exception not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Rate Type not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Allocation not valid for Prepaid Contract Line Type</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Rate Agreement Reference and Exception Reference must have the same Facilities and Administration Basis Type.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement Reference and Exception Reference must have the same Facilities and Administration Basis Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Rate Agreement Reference is required in order to specify an Exception Reference.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement Reference is required in order to specify an Exception Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Rate Type Reference is required if a Rate Agreement Reference is specified.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Revenue Allocation Profile Reference is required if a Rate Agreement Reference is specified.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Revenue Allocation Profile Reference is required if a Rate Agreement Reference is specified.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Rate Type Reference must be valid for the specified Rate Agreement Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Rate Agreement Reference is required in order to specify a Cost Rate Type Reference.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Overlapping Grant / Date combination exists between contract lines.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Overlapping Grant / Date combination exists between contract lines.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Line Type Reference must be one of Cost Reimbursable, Prepaid or Fixed Amount</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line End Date must be greater than Start Date.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line End Date must be greater than Start Date.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Data contains duplicate Receivable Contract Line Reference ID's.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Data contains duplicate Receivable Contract Line Reference ID's.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Line Amount required for Fixed Amount Line Type.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot use inactive Revenue Category</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>One or more Grants specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Grant can only be defined on one Award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>One or more Grants specified on the Award Line Data already exists on another Award; a Grant can only be defined on one Award.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktags are required but have not been assigned: [missing].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The following Accounting Worktag types are invalid: [invalid].</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference" type="wd:Receivable_Contract_Line_AbstractObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Receivable Contract Line Abstract for Award Contract Amendment Line Data Reference</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Receivable_Contract_Line_Reference_ID" This is the Receivable Contract Line unique identifier.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Number"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Contract Line Number</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The Award Line Number cannot be changed in an amendment.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Award Line Number cannot be changed in an amendment.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="4"/><xsd:minInclusive value="0"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="0"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Intercompany_Affiliate_Reference" type="wd:CompanyObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id for the award line company. The line company must be part of the header company's intercompany profile.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Set up an intercompany relationship between header and line company using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Set up an intercompany relationship between [hdr company] and [line company] using the Edit Company Intercompany Profile task.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Line company with different currency from header company not allowed for award.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Line company [line company] with currency [line company currency] not allowed for award with header company [hdr company] with currency [hdr company currency]</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active billing schedule. Change the billing schedule status first.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active billing schedule. Change the billing schedule status first.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active revenue recognition schedule. Change the revenue recognition schedule status first.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Cannot change line company for an award line assigned to an active revenue recognition schedule. Change the revenue recognition schedule status first.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Company and award header company must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Company [line company] and award header company [header company] must share a common legal entity. See Payroll Intercompany Relationship.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Revenue_Category_Reference" type="wd:Accounting_CategoryObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>This is the reference id value of the revenue category. A revenue category is a classification of services that drive the accounting, and indicates the types of services this Award line is intended to represent.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type>Revenue_Category_ID</wd:Common_Reference_ID_Type><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Revenue Category cannot be changed in amendment if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award costing for the grant on the line, or there are invoices created for the line, or the award cost processing job is currently running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Revenue Category cannot be changed in amendment if the line type is Prepaid, or there is non-canceled award costing for the grant on the line, or there are invoices created for the line, or the award cost processing job is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Lifecycle_Status_Reference" type="wd:Award_Lifecycle_StatusObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Lifecycle Status for Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status is invalid.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>The award line lifecycle status, [line lifecycle status], combination with award lifecycle status [header lifecycle status], is not permitted.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element name="Line_Type_Reference" type="wd:Contract_Line_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Line Type for the Award Line</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Award Line Type cannot be changed in an Amendment if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost Reimbursable line has an approved Billing Schedule, or there is non-canceled Award Costing for the Grants on the line, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Award Line Type cannot be changed in an Amendment if the Line Type is Prepaid and Invoices against the line exist, or if the line type is Fixed Amount and the line has an approved Billing Schedule, or if the line type is Cost Reimbursable line has an approved Billing Schedule, or there is non-canceled Award Costing for the Grants on the line, or if the Award Costing processes is currently running.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Item_Description" type="xsd:string"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A description of the Award Line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Deferred_Revenue" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean Flag indicating whether or not the revenue for the award line is deferred. Cannot be used for cost-reimbursable billing.</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Deferred Revenue cannot be changed in an amendment if the Line has an approved customer invoice line application or is on a non-cancelled revenue recognition schedule.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Deferred Revenue cannot be changed in an amendment if the Line has an approved customer invoice line application or is on a non-cancelled revenue recognition schedule.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Prepaid line must have deferred Revenue</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><wd:Validation_Message>Cost Reimburable Line cannot have deferred Revenue</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Primary_Grant" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award contract line is the primary line for the award</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Grant_Reference" type="wd:GrantObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award contract line is the primary line for the award</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Grant cannot be assigned to the line company because has commitments, obligations, or actual postings against it for another company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Grant cannot be assigned to the line company because has commitments, obligations, or actual postings against for another company.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>Grant [grant] cannot be assigned to line company [line company] because it has commitments, obligations, or actual postings against it for another company.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Line_Amount"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Line Amount</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="18"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="3"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Rate_Agreement_Reference" This rate agreement will be considered when calculating Facilities and Administration charges for expenses against this line.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Cost_Rate_Type_Reference" type="wd:Facilities_and_Admin_Cost_Rate_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Cost Rate Type for the Award Line. Please specify another.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Inactive" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>The Award Proposal Submission Type Inactive flag.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Put_Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_RequestType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Element containing Award Proposal Submission Type reference for update (or empty if a new Award Proposal Submission Type is being added).</xsd:documentation><xsd:appinfo><wd:Validation><xsd:documentation>Flag as an error the condition where an already-existing award proposal submission type is sent in add-only mode.</xsd:documentation><wd:Validation_Message>The Web Service is set to Add Only, but the Award Proposal Submission Type already exists.</wd:Validation_Message></wd:Validation></xsd:appinfo></xsd:annotation><xsd:sequence><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_Reference" type="wd:Award_Proposal_Submission_TypeObjectType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Reference to an existing Award Proposal Submission Type for update purposes only.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element><xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_Data" type="wd:Award_Proposal_Submission_Type_DataType"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Award Proposal Submission Type Data for the single award proposal submission type being created or updated.</xsd:documentation></xsd:annotation></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Add_Only" type="xsd:boolean"><xsd:annotation><xsd:documentation>Add Only Flag.
